programme.title: Acapulco Shore

programme.title: Acapulco Shore

programme.title: Acapulco Shore
programme.desc: El capitán regresa a la casa Shore. Un viaje en Catamarán genera un enfrentamiento entre Alba y Chile, mientras que a Fernanda le dañan una noche de pasión y Nacha explota contra Jacky.

programme.title: Acapulco Shore
programme.desc: Jaylin se abre con los Shores y les cuenta su historia. El grupo se relaja en un beach club pero los problemas siguen. Jaylin y Capitán discuten y la situación entre Nacha y Jacky se sale de control.

programme.title: Acapulco Shore

programme.title: Acapulco Shore
programme.desc: El Team Tendo le organiza una fiesta de 15 a su Matrioska y los Shores se entregan al festejo como solo ellos saben hacerlo. Todo es diversión hasta que una discusión inesperada excede todos los límites.

programme.title: Acapulco Shore

programme.title: Acapulco Shore

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Two old-fashioned dishes with modern appeal: Boston baked beans and chicken and dumplings. Neither requires fancy ingredients or expensive equipment, just a little time and effort.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: What's for Sunday dinner? Around many American tables, it's meat and potatoes. Beef brisket is a good choice and a nice change from pot roast or beef stew. Although inexpensive and simple to prepare, brisket does pose some challenges to the cook.

programme.title: Cook's Country
programme.desc: Bridget and Julia cook up Tennessee Pulled Turkey Sandwiches. Then, Adam reviews paper towels. Next, Jack challenges Bridget to a tasting of extra-sharp cheddar cheese. And finally, Bryan shows Bridget a recipe for Eastern North Carolina Fish Stew.

programme.title: Cook's Country
programme.desc: Julia and Bridget make the ultimate New Jersey Crumb Buns. Then, Adam reviews nonstick skillets. And finally, Lan Lam makes Julia a streamlined recipe for Cheese Blintzes with Raspberry Sauce.

programme.title: Cook's Country

programme.title: Cook's Country
programme.desc: Bryan makes Julia a tender and delicious Texas Barbecue Brisket. Then, Adam shows Bridget his top pick of coolers.

programme.title: Cook's Country
programme.desc: Bryan cooks Julia a surprising Italian classic: Chicago Thin-Crust Pizza with Homemade Italian Sausage. Next, Jack challenges Bridget to a live taste test of jarred pasta sauce. Finally, Lawman and Bridget reveal the secrets to a perfect Pasta Fagioli.

programme.title: Cook's Country
programme.desc: Bryan and Bridget reveal the secrets to making a Southern California classic, Smoked Fish Tacos. Next, Adam shows Julia his top pick of chimney starters. Finally, Christie makes Julia the perfect Grilled Steak Fajitas.

programme.title: Cook's Country
programme.desc: Christie shows Bridget how to make perfect Spice-Crusted Steaks. Adam shows his top pick for electric griddles. Jack challenges Bridget to a tasting of supermarket bacon. Finally, Ashley and Julia demonstrate Grilled Bacon Burgers with Caramelized Onions.

programme.title: Julia at Home

programme.title: Julia at Home

programme.title: Julia at Home
programme.desc: Julia shares her recipe for easy broiled salmon with mustard and crisp dilled crust, orzo salad with cucumber, red onion, and mint, plus a pretty and pink berry fool for dessert

programme.title: Julia at Home

programme.title: Julia at Home
programme.desc: Julia whips up her favorite Bloody Marys with fresh horseradish and homemade cocktail onions plus sheet-pan hash browns for a crowd and springy green Shakshuka.

programme.title: Julia at Home

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: There are certain dinners we rely on again and again. We are particularly fond of roasting chicken and potatoes together in one pan. While the chicken roasts, its juices drip onto the potatoes, giving them a wonderfully rich crust and creamy flavor.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: We develop a foolproof preparation for pork chops with vinegar and peppers—a modern version tangy and juicy enough to rival that prepared by an Italian grandmother. Next, we turn to pan-roasted pork tenderloin.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Tuna, which is often served rare to medium-rare, can be particularly tricky to get just right with a nicely seared crust. As for halibut, we developed a technique that ensured perfect texture without a loss of flavor.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Some people are intimidated by the thought of preparing fish. Traditional dishes, like Fish Meunière, can seem even more daunting. But you don't need to be wearing a toque to prepare this French classic well.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Most Italian recipes seem startlingly easy to prepare, requiring just a few simple ingredients. But some dishes need special care to reach their full potential. In this episode, we demystify two Italian classics: Fettuccine Alfredo and Beef in Barolo.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: In this episode, we prepare an Indian-inspired shrimp curry and a Thai-inspired green curry with chicken.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Catherine Southon decides to change her buying strategy, going for more of Philip Serrell's rust-and-woodworm fare. Phil diverts to the beach and asks a local fisherman if he has some antique chandlery to sell!

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Catherine Southon heads to Porthcurno to see the incredible cables that stretch from this little village to South America, Australia, and India. Phil Serrell goes for a ride on a replica of the Puffing Devil.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Catherine Southon heads to the Royal Mint and finds out how Sir Isaac Newton revolutionized coins to prevent forgers. Phil Serrell gets a lesson in the culture at the Bristol Old Vic and discovers why it's a miracle the building still stands.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Paul Laidlaw and Claire Rawle are in Northumberland. Paul discovers the Morpeth Olympics and Claire learns about the female Indiana Jones, Gertrude Bell. Everything's rosy until Claire mentions she loves militaria -- Paul's specialty!

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Claire Rawle finds out about the Tynemouth Volunteer Life Brigade and Paul Laidlaw visits a military observation post in Blyth. And Paul finds some RAF stereoscopic aerial reconnaissance photographs of German U-boats at a great price.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Claire Rawle discovers the history of big game fishing in the 1930s, while Paul Laidlaw sets off to rendezvous in a secret WWII bunker. Paul buys a pair of Charles Barlow vases, and Claire picks up an early 20th-century spectacle case.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Paul Laidlaw finds a rare 18th-century puzzle jug, and Claire Rawle some Shelley porcelain. Paul discovers how Hull was vital to thousands of Jews fleeing from Tsarist Russia and Claire indulges her passion for all things railway.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: In the final, Paul Laidlaw hopes a late 17th-century hand-forged halberd head will earn him a huge profit. Claire Rawle buys a Chinese cloisonné vase and an Edwardian inkstand. Will Claire be the comeback kid and crush the mighty Laidlaw?

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Christina Trevanion and Mark Stacey take their classic car to an auction in Merseyside. Christina detours to learn about the history of the British seaside in Bognor Regis and Mark visits the last surviving Victorian Brickworks in Britain.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Christina Trevanion and Mark Stacey's antiquing adventure continues in the Cotswolds. Mark discovers a rural idyll that inspired a best seller novel while Christina learns about an incredible war hero.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: In Cheshire, Christina Trevanion ends up deep underground and Mark Stacey finds himself in such a predicament he has to call for help! Mark finds a Home Guard practice rifle while Christina makes a peculiar purchase of a human jaw.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: The team is at the seaside resort of Ventnor. Under scrutiny is a family portrait showing a Speaker of the House of Commons as a young boy and 75 Austin vehicles. We also hear the story of how a photograph saved a woman's life.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Michael Aspel introduces a selection of unscreened finds from recent Roadshows. Items include an Edward VIII Coronation souvenir that was hastily converted to an abdication mug, early fan mail for Elton John and a collection of art deco treasures.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: The Roadshow team head for Lancaster. Amongst the items uncovered in the Town Hall are a valuable pair of clogs, a moving series of letters from Crimea, an anti-slavery ring and a rare and intricately woven tapestry valued at £10,000.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: The team heads for Coughton Court in Warwickshire. Amongst the items are original designs from one of Britain's leading graphic artists of the 20th Century, a bizarre Japanese depiction of skeletons dancing and a lost masterpiece valued at GBP60,000.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: A return visit to Coughton Court in Warwickshire where the experts get excited about an Agatha Christie letter, a medal awarded to those who came to the aid of the Titanic survivors and a rare china figure of the Queen on horseback.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: The team visits Sydney in Australia. Amongst the items under scrutiny are pieces of furniture made by convicts, a part of the keel of Captain Cook's ship, The Endeavour, and one collector receives one of the biggest valuations in Roadshow history.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: The team heads to Norwich where, in the Cathedral cloisters, they uncover more treasures. Amongst the items are a letter from Lord Nelson, a series of portraits depicting ancestors of Walt Disney, and correspondence from John Lennon's Aunt Mimi.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: We revisit the cloisters of Norwich Cathedral. The team uncovers original illustrations from Black Beauty, a rare saucer used for many years as an ashtray is valued at £1,000, and some fragments of porcelain remind of the events that destroyed Hiroshima.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Michael Aspel and the team travel to Londonderry. Amongst the items under scrutiny are the most intricately produced hand cut pictures to ever appear on the programme, a cache of silver valued at over GBP100,000 and a cushion woven from human hair.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Michael Aspel introduces unscreened finds from recent venues. Amongst the treasures are a pair of figures that narrowly escaped a bombing raid in World War 2, a recipe book with hair raising potions and a painting by one of Queen Victoria's children.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Michael Aspel and the experts set up camp in Somerset. Amongst the items are a set of chairs that witnessed the battle of Trafalgar, a postcard collection valued at GBP100,000 and a vicars wife confesses to a weakness for vintage underwear.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: In Somerset, Michael Aspel and the team discover more intriguing finds including one of the rarest pieces of silver ever found on the Roadshow, a car powered by steam, and a set of original illustrations for Winnie the Pooh draw gasps when valued.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: In the Royal Exhibition Building, in Melbourne, Australia, Michael Aspel and the team uncover a rich vein including relics from the days of gold strikes, a flag flown at the battle of Trafalgar and a sad-looking bear with a jaw-dropping value.

programme.title: Bad Girls Club: Miami
programme.desc: Kristen and Lea turn against Danielle; unexpected company arrives.

programme.title: Bad Girls Club: Miami
programme.desc: Brandi unleashes a storm of destruction when her wallet goes missing; Kristen grows increasingly resentful of Lea.

programme.title: Bad Girls Club: Miami
programme.desc: The girls are on the road to Key West where Lea and Kristen's friendship self-destructs.

programme.title: Bad Girls Club: Miami
programme.desc: Ashley confronts Christina during the final days at the house; two former roommates make an unwelcome visit.

programme.title: Bad Girls Club: Miami
programme.desc: Perez Hilton hosts as the Bad Girls Miami cast reunites to discuss unfinished business, and the sparks continue to fly.

programme.title: Bad Girls Club: Miami
programme.desc: Perez Hilton hosts as the Bad Girls Miami cast reunites to discuss unfinished business, and the sparks continue to fly.

programme.title: Bad Girls Club: Miami
programme.desc: Some of favorite Bad Girls Alumni count down the 10 most OMG! moments from the history of Bad Girls club.

programme.title: Bad Girls Club: Hollywood
programme.desc: The bad girls return to Hollywood.

programme.title: Bad Girls Club: Hollywood
programme.desc: Char gets the girls to strike back against Nikki's dominance.

programme.title: Bad Girls Club: Hollywood
programme.desc: A new face stirs up drama in the house; Char's attempt to kick out Nikki turns criminal.

programme.title: Bad Girls Club: Hollywood
programme.desc: Sydney stirs up drama upon her return to the house; the roommates head to San Francisco to blow off steam.

programme.title: Bad Girls Club: Hollywood
programme.desc: New battle lines are drawn between Lauren and Char; Kori opens up about her past.

programme.title: Bad Girls Club: Hollywood
programme.desc: Nikki and the new roommate get off to a rocky start; Lauren tries to push Char out of the house; three of the girls try out for Playboy.

programme.title: Bar Rescue
programme.desc: Jenny McCarthy joins Jon to help the Thunderbolt Bar & Grill, whose owner is an inexperienced man with poor leadership skills, and his only ally is threatening to withdraw her services.

programme.title: Bar Rescue
programme.desc: Owners Mark and Ozzie call on Jon for a second time when they need help with their outdated and failing bar, The Edge of Town, in Blue Springs, MO.

programme.title: Bar Rescue
programme.desc: Jon arrives in Littleton, Colorado, to find a mother and son at odds over running the haphazardly decorated G.I. Jodi's, which was originally conceived to honor the military.

programme.title: Bar Rescue
programme.desc: In affluent Aurora, CO, an undisciplined singer turned bar owner has allowed his bloated ego to destroy his business and family, and Jon's team must repair the damage.

programme.title: Bar Rescue
programme.desc: The owner of Utah's The Fifth realized too late that running a successful bar wasn't as easy as his dad made it look, and now he's poised to squander his family's legacy.

programme.title: Bar Rescue
programme.desc: An inexperienced bar owner calls on Jon after hiring a hard-partying manager with no industry knowledge to run Broadway Club in Tooele, Utah.

programme.title: Bar Rescue
programme.desc: In Layton, Utah, Jon confronts Brandon, the emotionally exhausted owner of Linda Lou's Time for Two, who has bled himself and his mother dry trying to keep the bar open.

programme.title: Bar Rescue
programme.desc: Jon is in Midvale, Utah, to meet The Union owner Bill, who is over $500,000 in debt and hasn't picked up any of the bar knowledge required to help his staff.

programme.title: Bar Rescue
programme.desc: Jon is brought in to save The Sandbar in Albuquerque, New Mexico, but before he can save the failing beach-themed bar, he has to figure out who the actual owner is first.

programme.title: Bar Rescue
programme.desc: Jon is in New Mexico to help Mike, the owner of Lucky 66 Bowl, who is over a million dollars in debt and keeps driving customers and employees out the door with his temper.

programme.title: Bar Rescue
programme.desc: Jon is in Albuquerque, New Mexico, to help Commander Rudy and his staff recruit young veterans to become members and inject new life into his VFW Post 6216 bar and hall.

programme.title: Bar Rescue
programme.desc: Jon visits Tracy, California, to help the divorced owners of Grant Bar & Lounge clean up their act and bring cohesion to their competing nightclub/restaurant concept.

programme.title: Bar Rescue
programme.desc: When the owner of Jolt'n Joe's in San Diego was diagnosed with cancer, he began leaning on his manager, but a broken promise over equity threatens to run the bar into the ground.

programme.title: Bar Rescue
programme.desc: Jon travels to Oakland, California, to help Marshawn Lynch turn around his bar, Rob Ben's, by teaching the NFL star to treat his staff less like family and more like a team.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: When a woman Mitch refers to as “The Mermaid” turns out to be the wife of a crime boss, an FBI agent comes to catch him before he can escape the country. Things become complicated when Mitch and the catty FBI Agent butt heads.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: The beach descends into chaos when DJ Larry "Loomin" Large announces a beach wide treasure hunt for a gold pirate doubloon worth $100,000. The Baywatch team is put on high alert when thousands of reckless treasure hunters storm the beach.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: When the hot Santa Ana winds move in from the desert, things start heating up on the Baywatch beach in more ways than one, as it seems like all the “weirdos” in the world have been blown to the beach.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: Tracy, a lifeguard-turned-hovercraft expert, arrives at Baywatch to demonstrate the benefits of the new rescue vehicle. Meanwhile, The National Pro Beach Volleyball Tour arrives, reigniting Matt's desire to be a professional beach volleyball star.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: Matt and Hobie rescue a young boy who is being harassed by a thug and take care of him until they can get him to his mother, but he seems to be hiding a deep dark secret. Meanwhile, CJ falls for a handsome young man who turns out to be taboo.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: Joey joins Mitch and Hobie in decorating for Christmas. CJ has a great time working with Father Ryan but starts to worry that he may misinterpret her warmth as flirting, and that he may be considering quitting the priesthood for her.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: Logan's visa is soon to expire, and he will be sent back to Australia unless he gets a green card. He plans on earning the money to purchase one in an upcoming boat race. Meanwhile Mitch’s mother visits.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: Stephanie is kidnapped by an eco-terrorist. The Baywatch team must stop the terrorist before she blows up an oil rig with Stephanie constrained inside it!

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: Mitch proposes to Tracy, but the happy moment is short-lived as she reveals she has a terminal illness. With the team being short-staffed it is up to Logan and Caroline to deal with reckless wave runners.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: Mitch is still mourning Tracy’s death, so Hobie seeks help from a radio show to help Mitch recover. Caroline resuscitates a man with AIDS, which puts a strain on her relationship with Logan. And CJ enters a ballroom dancing competition.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: Mitch receives a mysterious package his father had put together before he died. Mitch and his father never saw eye-to-eye, but this gift impacts Mitch more than he ever thought possible. Logan visits a hypnotist to deal with a past trauma.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: Andy, an old friend of Mitch, visits Baywatch to complete four days of lifeguard service in order to remain on the active roster. But Andy's strong-arm tactics do not sit well with the other lifeguards.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: Matt and CJ stumble upon a homeless man who shockingly turns out to be someone they know very well. Meanwhile, Mitch must rescue a boy's brother from drug smugglers so the boy can receive a life-saving transplant of his brother's bone marrow.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: When testing out a new flying machine, Mitch spots a makeshift raft with a stranded woman in it. Mitch must help the Chinese woman find her sister. Back at headquarters, Matt and Garner deal with a beach robbery scam.

programme.title: Bellator MMA Full Fight Cards
programme.desc: Bellator 299: Eblen vs. Edwards was a mixed martial arts event produced by Bellator MMA, that took place on September 23, 2023, at the 3Arena in Dublin, Ireland.

programme.title: Bellator MMA Full Fight Cards
programme.desc: Watch historic Bellator 300, headlined by a semifinal matchup in the LWGP between current champion Usman Nurmagomedov vs. former champion Brent Primus

programme.title: Bellator MMA Full Fight Cards
programme.desc: Undefeated Welterweight Ukrainian champ Yaroslav Amosov puts his belt on the line against Jamaican Jason Jackson.

programme.title: Bellator MMA Full Fight Cards
programme.desc: Bellator MMA returns to Hollywood, Florida with an explosive night of fights. Champion Eddie Alvarez defends his belt against Lightweight Tournament Winner Michael Chandler in one of Bellator MMA's most epic fights.

programme.title: Bellator MMA Full Fight Cards
programme.desc: Bellator MMA comes to Irvine with two belts on the line! First Pat Curren defends his Featherweight belt against Patricio 'Pitbull' Freire. Then in the main event, Michael Chandler takes on Rick Hawn for the Lightweight World Championship.

programme.title: Bellator MMA Full Fight Cards
programme.desc: Bellator MMA returns to Thackerville, Oklahoma as Ben Askren defends his Welterweight belt against Season 7 tournament winner Karl Amoussou. Plus the Bellator MMA debut of King Mo fighting in his home state.

programme.title: Bellator MMA Full Fight Cards
programme.desc: Bellator MMA returns to Atlantic City, NJ with the Featherweight Championship belt on the line! Champion Pat Curran defends his title against Season 8 Featherweight tournament winner Shahbulat Shamhalaev.

programme.title: Bellator MMA Full Fight Cards
programme.desc: Bellator MMA comes to Rio Rancho, NM. Welterweight Champion Ben Askren takes on Welterweight season 8 tournament winner Andrey Koreskov. Then Michael Chandler defends his Lightweight belt against the Lightweight season 8 tournament winner David Rickels.

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: From curing rare forms of cancer to foreseeing mass destruction, to freeing others from sickness and sin, Julia believes she is "God's chosen prophet". Parents, Mark and Cheryll, worry their daughter is mentally ill with deep concern for the grandkids.

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Megan's ex-boyfriend Andy is trying to replace her as their 5-year-old son's mother with his new fiancée, Caitlin. Megan says Andy lied to the judge, falsely painting her as unfit, unstable & a drug addict. Andy says Megan's tale of woe is a sob story.

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Kristle, Kayla & Patrick say mom Sherry has blown a $250,000 inheritance in 11 months, with $500 bar tabs & new motorcycles. But that's not it. They say mom takes non-prescribed pills, washes them down with rum & has pulled out a loaded gun while arguing.

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Dr. Phil sits down with mom Cindy with footage of her daughter Sarah's street life: prostitution, smoking crack cocaine and shooting heroin. Twin Tecoa tells how it began. Off the streets and into The Dr. Phil House, will the girls commit to rehab? Part 1

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Dr. Phil exposes an online dating fraud -- a catfish -- accused of duping as many as 26 women into relationships. What were the red flags the women missed? Plus, a Dr. Phil producer tracks the catfish down -- and you won’t believe who they find!

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Dr. Phil continues his mission to end the silence on domestic violence. More than 25 percent of battered women remain in a relationship with their abuser. Sonya fears that she is one of those women who stay. Hear her story.

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: If you're in difficult economic times & looking for ways to save money, start taking notes! Dr. Phil's guests offer tips to help save on clothes, utilities & vacations. Learn how to cut your grocery bill in half & how to entertain family inexpensively.

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Angie says stepfather Ralph routinely sexually abused her as a teen. Angie says that her stepfather didn't stop with her, he turned his attention, affection & sexual abuse toward her daughter Hannah. They say grandma Leta knew, yet looked the other way.

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Do you have a relative scheming to get money from a rich aunt, uncle or even parents when they pass away?

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Melissa says Destoni, 14, is an aggressive, violent bully. She's chased her sister with a butcher knife, yells at teachers in the hallways but Destoni crossed a line when she threatened to shoot her teacher and other students, causing suspension. Part 1

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Thomas Cogdell was 12 when he and his mom discovered his 11-year-old sister, Kaylee, dead, tied up on her bed. Now 18, Thomas shares what he experienced on that fateful day. Don't miss this compelling look at false confessions & justice gone wrong.

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Dr. Phil continues his conversation with Trisha, a mother and wife, who is live-streaming her entire life. Find out what caused Trisha to storm off and collapse on stage. Did Dr. Phil almost have to call the paramedics? Pt. 2

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Caroline & Sonny admit their nearly 3-yr marriage has been tumultuous with both sides alleging verbal & physical abuse. The situation worsened when the unthinkable happened: Sonny cheated on Caroline with her sister, Ashley, after a night of drinking.

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Jean says her 17-year-old daughter, Cheyenne, was the all-American girl , a cheerleader, track star and straight-A honor student until she began dating Josh, a 28-year-old divorced father. Dr. Phil takes a look at Josh's history, should Jean be concerned?

channel.display-name: Best of The Drew Barrymore Show

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: In an all-new Drew Gooder Drew has a big surprise in store for Deloris "NuNu" and Patrick "PopPop" Hogan who run a safe and reliable 24-hour daycare to help the parents in their community.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Drew and Ross Mathews are serving the news sunny side up in an all-new Drew's News. Plus, "Bros" stars Ts Madison, Jim Rash and Miss Lawrence.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Actress and author of the new audiobook, "Inside Voice" Lake Bell stops by to chat.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Drew and Ross cover news about a senior dance troupe and a Jet-Puffed marshmallow pillow. Mark Anderson and Ryan Fey make skirt steak tacos. Damona Hoffman and Drew answer red flag questions.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: RuPaul's Drag Race" host RuPaul is talking about the show and helping Drew come up with her drag name!

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Drew is joined by "Shotgun Wedding" star Josh Duhamel to chat about his new film. Inside Edition correspondent Lisa Guerrero is joining Drew and Ross Mathews to cover the headlines in a new Drew's News and dishes on her new memoir.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Drew and Ross are joined by "She-Hulk" star Jameela Jamil at the news desk. Then, it's an all-new Mom's Time Out: Vegas Edition, where Drew surprises deserving moms with a night out at the Magic Mike Live show.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Gossip Girl" star Thomas Doherty is dishing on season two of the show! Dating expert Damona Hoffman is back and talking to Drew about "Drew love.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Weird: The Al Yankovic Story" star Daniel Radcliffe stops by to chat.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Chef Remi Cruz is joining Drew in the kitchen to whip up some delicious fried mac n' cheese bites. The world's oldest female comedian Dionne Forest is doing a hilarious stand-up set.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Comedian Celeste Barber, known for her hilarious celebrity parodies, joins Drew and Ross Mathews at the news desk to cover the latest headlines including the one perk employees most wish their employer would offer and share Rihanna's latest collab.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Drew and Ross Mathews are serving the news sunny-side up and covering topics like the solutions you can try if you're a chronic late texter and the reason many people are opting for environmentally friendly burials.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Entertainment Tonight's Kevin Frazier and Nischelle Turner are joining Drew and Ross Mathews at the Drew's News desk for a special Oscars themed Drew's News, sharing their predictions for the awards show.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: The Last Thing He Told Me" star Jennifer Garner is getting a big birthday surprise from Drew.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: A League of Their Own" star Abbi Jacobson opens up about her recent engagement, her bestie Ilana Glazer, what it was like co-creating, writing, producing and starring in "A League of Their Own" and more!

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Drew and Bill Nye The Science Guy are serving the news sunny-side up in an all new Drew's News. Then, Chef Pilar Valdes reveals five essential pantry items and turns them into a delicious dish.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Drew and Ross Mathews are serving the news sunny-side up in an all new Drew's News. Then, it's an all-new Cookbook Club with "Half Baked Harvest" author Tieghan Gerard who is whipping up Finish Spicy Shrimp Tacos.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Lena Dunham on her new medieval comedy film "Catherine Called Birdy." Plus, Drew and Ross Mathews are serving the news sunny-side up in an all new Drew's News.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Former first lady Michelle Obama is telling Drew about how she remains grounded, raising kids with social media and the inspiration for her new book, "The Light We Carry.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Golden Globe winner Anya Taylor-Joy stops by to chat with Drew about her new film "The Menu." Drew and Ross Mathews are serving the news sunny-side up in an all new Drew's News.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Culinary legend Ina Garten joins Drew at the news desk to break down the latest food headlines including desserts only invites and the gravestone recipe trend.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: The cast of "Daisy Jones and the Six" talk with Drew about their new show! They're chatting all about the 70's theme of the show, their time on set and more!

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Drew and Ross Mathews are serving the news sunny side up in an all-new Drew's News covering everything from rumors of the next actor cast as James Bond as being someone in their 30s.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Drew and Ross Mathews are covering the hottest headlines in an all-new Drew's News like the study that found laughter can be a giveaway for romantic attraction.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Actress Susan Sarandon joins Drew to chat about her new country music drama "Monarch." Plus, Susan joins Drew and Ross Mathews at the Drew's News desk to help serve the news sunny side up.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Drew is chatting with actress Katherine Heiglabout the return of "Firefly Lane" and more.Plus, inan all-new Drew's News, Katherine Heigl joinsDrew and Ross Mathewsat the news desk to hit the headlines.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: The Neighborhood" star Cedric the Entertainer is telling Drew about his twenty years of marriage and being back on the road again doing comedy shows.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: While Granny is away in Hooterville, Mr. Drysdale hires a gorgeous Italian cook who speaks no English.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Granny and the Italian chef compete to see who will cook for the family.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: The Clampetts spend Thanksgiving in Hooterville.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Mr. Drysdale casts Dash Riprock as Homer Noodleman, a potential new lover for Elly May.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Jethro wants a new identity with the replacement of their old truck with a modern hot rod. Granny wants to stay with the old truck. To prove how good the old truck is, Granny races Jethro in his hot rod.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: The Clampetts prepare to go to Hooterville for Christmas.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Mr. Drysdale follows the Clampetts and Miss Jane to Hooterville where they are spending Christmas. He takes Ellie's bear Fairchild with him and gets himself thrown in jail in a little town. Sam Drucker shows up to help.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Mr. Drysdale is sick, and Dr. Granny springs into action with a chimp as a nurse. But Ellie's bear Fairchild has taken a liking to granny's flu remedy. During this, Mrs. Drysdale tries to impress society Mrs. Van Ransonhoff.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Jethro is evicted because his 50 cent allowance won't cover the rent. The other Clampetts take over the space with Granny will cut hair or pull teeth. Jed will sharpen tools and whittle something. Ellie is the pretty receptionist.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: With the Clampetts established in business in Jethro's vacated office space, a building inspector visits to find out about their business operations on the 5th floor.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Mr. Drysdale hires a troubleshooter for the bank. His main mission is to get the Clampetts to close their business operating out of the 5th floor.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Sam Drucker comes to Beverly Hills to visit, and Granny assumes he's interested in courting her.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Jethro meets Mrs. Drysdale's guru and decides he wants to be one also. Granny thinks it's all nonsense, but when she tries to put a stop to it the followers find her common sense inspiring and make her the head guru.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: The Drysdales now jog so the banker can get the account of Jason Detweiler, head of a running club. The Clampetts don't understand the concept, leading to misunderstandings, then Ellie and Jethro become enthusiastic.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Famous singer Pat Boone is in the neighborhood and smells Granny's cooking. He wanders into their backyard and the Clampetts befriend him, thinking he's a hill country man down on his luck.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: The hillbillies move back to the hills to find Elly May a husband, much to the dismay of banker Drysdale.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: The Clampetts arrive in the mountain town of Silver Dollar City, where Granny starts a feud with an old rival, Elverna Bradshaw.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Granny continues her efforts to get Elly May married, extolling the young girl's virtues to every bachelor she meets.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Bird watcher Jane Hathaway hikes into the woods and finds a man for Elly May.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: The Clampetts rehearse for Elly May's wedding to backwoodsman Matthew Templeton, unaware that banker Drysdale wants it stopped.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Drysdale and Jane arrive in New York to persuade the hillbillies to abandon their half-built cabin in Central Park and return home.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Granny insists she doesn't need glasses, although she carries on a conversation with a pet seal, thinking it's Elly's new boyfriend.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Shorty Kellems, proprietor of the hotel in Silver Dollar, sells out and leaves the hills to join the Clampetts in California.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Granny uses her shotgun as she punishes Jethro for leading too wild a Hollywood life with Shorty Kellems.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Mrs. Drysdale's nephew, who possesses a wealth of confidence but no talent, takes over Drysdale's private office at his Beverly Hills Bank.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: The Clampetts visit Hooterville and Jed arranges to go into the airline business with pilot Steve Elliott.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Banker Drysdale eagerly prepares to set up the deal for a new airline formed by Jed and farmer Howard Hewes, thinking him the famous millionaire Howard Hughes.

programme.title: Black Ink Crew
programme.desc: Bae is officially back at the Brooklyn shop. Ceaser decides to relocate the entire crew to Atlanta but Puma's nerves get the best of him when someone tests positive for COVID.

programme.title: Black Ink Crew
programme.desc: The crew moves into their new mansion in Atlanta. Tatti gets a promotion at the shop, while Donna starts a new hustle that puts them on a collision course. Meanwhile, a family crisis devastates Ceaser.

programme.title: Black Ink Crew
programme.desc: After a rocky start in Atlanta, things only get worse as Rok and Krystal's relationship gets tested by an artist in the Atlanta crew. Donna and Tatti's argument over a space in the new shop spills over into their personal lives.

programme.title: Black Ink Crew
programme.desc: Tensions between Donna and the team come to a head when the Black Ink Bosses decide to bring the teams together for some team bonding in the woods.

programme.title: Black Ink Crew
programme.desc: Tired of the constant fighting over who the best tattoo artist is, Ceaser decides to have the Black Ink artists put their art where their mouth is by conducting the first Black Ink tattoo competition to crown the lead artist.

programme.title: Black Ink Crew
programme.desc: Alex struggles with quarantining and his relationship with Donna, Tatti heads to Long Island to check on her family, and Krystal performs at Ted's showcase.

programme.title: Black Ink Crew
programme.desc: As the crew gets ready to return to New York, Ceaser plans a final party in Atlanta and stuns Suzette when he gets down on one knee. Walt goes to extreme lengths to prove his innocence.

programme.title: Black Ink Crew
programme.desc: The team is back from their Atlanta residency but quickly find out - what happens in Atlanta doesn't stay in Atlanta. Ceaser and the crew throw a block party to help stop the spread of Covid in the community by offering free tattoos for vaccines.

programme.title: Black Ink Crew
programme.desc: Ceaser holds a press conference in an attempt to clear his name, but when Ted doesn't show up to stand by him, he seeks support from an unlikely place. Spyder and Rok get to the bottom of what's been causing problems between them.

programme.title: Black Ink Crew
programme.desc: After the success of the Black Ink Battle in Atlanta, Puma decides, with Ceaser out of town, it's time for a Battle of the Sexes! Bae holds a walk for both Black Lives Matter and Stop Asian Hate with the support of the whole crew.

programme.title: Black Ink Crew
programme.desc: Bae finds out that her client from the tattoo competition had a negative experience with the Girls' Team. Ted and Krystal start preparing for an upcoming music video, and Ceaser fixes the failed Puma Production by bringing in an old friend.

programme.title: Black Ink Crew
programme.desc: Ceaser and Puma plan a huge billboard photo shoot with the help of Sassy, but then everything goes left. Ted gives Krystal an ultimatum, Rok has a family emergency and Ceaser gets some devastating news about his daughter.

programme.title: Black Ink Crew
programme.desc: In the fallout of the court's decision, Ceaser steps into another crisis when Suzette learns she's facing serious health issues. Spyder celebrates his good health news by hosting a COVID-safe party. It's time to Mask-erade!

programme.title: Black Ink Crew
programme.desc: Puma takes his family and in-laws on a luxury glamping trip on the land he co-owns at Chace Village. Ceaser invites Black Ink Chicago's very own Van to look after the shop while he confronts Suzette in Atlanta about their relationship.

programme.title: Hangin' With Mr. Cooper
programme.desc: Mark becomes the new head coach of the undefeated basketball team after Coach Corley quits. He starts to think that he doesn't have what it takes to be a winning coach when the team loses their very first game under his coaching.

programme.title: Hangin' With Mr. Cooper
programme.desc: After Mark and Denise's break-up, Mark discovers that he really does love her and jumps through hoops to get her back. Nicole and Tyler work together selling candy bars in an effort to win the prize for the most sold, a CD player.

programme.title: Hangin' With Mr. Cooper
programme.desc: In order to be with his girlfriend, Mark lies to Nicole. Mark allows Nicole to punish him after she realizes that he lied. But soon he is tempted to lie to her again.

programme.title: Hangin' With Mr. Cooper
programme.desc: As the new coach of Nicole's floundering all-girl baseball team, Mark conspires to dress Tyler up as a girl to help the team. Baseball greats FRANK ROBINSON (himself) and ALBERT BELLE (himself) also came to help.

programme.title: Hangin' With Mr. Cooper
programme.desc: Mark and Vanessa think that they won the lottery but can't find their winning ticket.

programme.title: Hangin' With Mr. Cooper
programme.desc: Mark becomes a local hero but an awards ceremony reveals the truth. ELIHU HARRIS, the mayor of Oakland, guest stars as himself in his acting debut. DICK CLARK also appears as himself.

programme.title: Hangin' With Mr. Cooper
programme.desc: Mark's good advice to Earvin about romance somehow causes Earvin to elope with his new girlfriend, and Earvin's mother wants Mark to stop the couple.

programme.title: Hangin' With Mr. Cooper
programme.desc: Geneva's crazy Aunt Eunetta (also played by SAUNDRA QUARTERMAN) comes to visit and decides that roommates Mark and Vanessa would be the perfect couple. Nicole is upset when Tyler and his friend won't let her play in their boys-only clubhouse.

programme.title: Everybody Hates Chris
programme.desc: Chris reluctantly agrees to hold onto a stash of marijuana for a criminal on the run, but he finds it difficult to find an appropriate hiding place that won't get him in trouble.

programme.title: Everybody Hates Chris
programme.desc: As punishment for Chris' disruption of history class, Chris and his classmates are given the assignment of memorizing a famous speech from World War II and reciting it in front of the class.

programme.title: Mentes criminales
programme.desc: La UAC implementa una estrategia elaborada para tratar de acabar con el anillo de sicarios “Los doce sucios”, con Reid jugando un papel central.

programme.title: Mentes criminales
programme.desc: Cuando se encuentran cuerpos en lugares públicos alrededor de Boston, el UAC investiga si un taxi o servicio de transporte que las víctimas utilizaron antes de su muerte podría guiar hasta el sospechoso.

programme.title: Mentes criminales
programme.desc: La UAC busca un móvil y un sospechoso cuando las víctimas se encuentran en los inodoros de las paradas de camiones a lo largo de las carreteras en todo el sur.

programme.title: NCIS: Criminología Naval
programme.desc: El Director Vance, aún de luto por la pérdida de su mujer y la madre de sus hijos, descubre inesperada información personal que le generará dudas sobre absolutamente todo.

programme.title: NCIS: Criminología Naval
programme.desc: NCIS rastrea intensamente a Ducky y Jimmy luego de haber desaparecido mientras transportaban el cuerpo de una escena del crimen.

programme.title: NCIS: Criminología Naval
programme.desc: Un frenesí mediático en torno a un criminal no identificado lleva al barbero de Gibbs a cuestionar la participación de su hijo y pedirle ayuda para descartarlo como el principal sospechoso.

programme.title: NCIS: Criminología Naval
programme.desc: La esposa de un Marine especializado en la detección de bombas K-9 urge al equipo de NCIS para que investigue la reciente muerte de su marido en Afghanistan.

programme.title: Blue Bloods (en español): Ayúdame a ayudarte
programme.desc: Linda pide a Danny y Báez que ayuden a su compañera de trabajo, quien está teniendo problemas con su exmarido enfurecido.

programme.title: Blue Bloods (en español): Amigos en necesidad
programme.desc: Jamie y Danny difieren en cómo manejar a un novato imprudente del NYPD, Marcus, hijo de un amigo de Danny. Mientras tanto, Erin investiga una mala inversión en la que se vio envuelto su investigador, Anthony, por culpa de su primo.

programme.title: Blue Bloods (en español): Ciudad despiadada
programme.desc: Frank y Danny colaboran para ayudar a Nick Constantine, un exconvicto rehabilitado que Frank había encarcelado años atrás, cuando Constantine se ve implicado en el asesinato de un viejo enemigo.

programme.title: Blue Bloods (en español): Consecuencias del pasado
programme.desc: Danny y Baez buscan a una banda de ladrones en una ola de crímenes, y se unen al detective Jimmy Mosley, quien años atrás rompió el corazón de Baez.

programme.title: Anthony Bourdain: Parts Unknown
programme.desc: Aired 10/06/2013. Home to chef Rene Redzepi of Noma, Copenhagen is known as the cultural center of Denmark. Anthony Bourdain explores its fantastic food and natural beauty.

programme.title: Anthony Bourdain: Parts Unknown
programme.desc: Aired 10/13/2013. Anthony Bourdain visits Sicily, where he goes fishing for his supper and sets out to find a home-cooked meal.

programme.title: The History of Comedy
programme.desc: Aired 2/9/2017. Tracking the evolution of inappropriate humor throughout history, showcasing the work from groundbreaking comedians who risked their careers, prison sentences, and even their lives as they fought against censorship.

programme.title: The History of Comedy
programme.desc: Aired 2/16/2017. Exploring and celebrating the greatest female comedians of all time and how they were able to succeed in every genre where humor is found despite rampant sexism and prejudice.

programme.title: The History of Comedy
programme.desc: Aired 2/23/2017. Examining how comedians find humor in the simple daily experiences we all share to make us laugh.

programme.title: The History of Comedy
programme.desc: Aired 7/23/2017. Tracing the origins of topical humor from the invention of the monologue to the fake news shows of today.

programme.title: American Style
programme.desc: Aired 01/13/2019. During a time of unprecedented expansion in prosperity and consumerism, America felt pressure for conformity as paranoia set in over a growing cold war.

programme.title: Anthony Bourdain: Parts Unknown
programme.desc: Aired 09/29/2013. With a combination of cultures, New Mexico has the largest Hispanic population per capita in the US. Go with Anthony Bourdain as he explores.

programme.title: COPS

programme.title: COPS

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Grissom and Warrick take the case of a young man who is found naked in the desert without an obvious cause of death.

programme.title: CSI

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Grissom and his team investigate the death of a first class passenger on a flight to Las Vegas.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Grissom and Sara investigate a bug riddled body found in the desert. Warrick and Catherine look into the theft of some valuable art.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: A woman is abducted from a supermarket. In the store, Grissom finds a bathroom stall door that claims five women have been killed.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: A man about to go on trial for arson and the murder of his wife and child seeks assistance from Grissom to help prove his innocence.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: A bomb goes off in an office building, killing one and injuring many more. The chief suspect is a security guard who left minutes before the explosion and has knowledge in bomb making.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: When a single human bone is discovered in the desert, Grissom and Catherine must cover miles of territory to find the rest of the skeleton.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: At a swanky fundraiser, attended by the sheriff, a woman turns up dead in the pool.

programme.title: CSI

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: A body is found in a pottery store in what's apparently a robbery that was interrupted.

programme.title: CSI

programme.title: CSI

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Encuentran un cadáver en una tienda de cerámica en lo que parece ser un robo interrumpido.

programme.title: CSI

programme.title: Caso Cerrado
programme.desc: Marcos iba manejando y se percata que a su lado va una chica que se desnuda al conducir, él choca. Por otro lado, Jacobo es el principal sospechoso por la desaparición de su mujer y su hija.

programme.title: Caso Cerrado
programme.desc: Juana padece la enfermedad de Cupido, siente una gran felicidad, ganas de vivir, tener sexo y salir con jóvenes. Por otro lado, Claudia publicó en internet el acoso sexual de su jefe.

programme.title: Caso Cerrado
programme.desc: Adam hace una campaña en las redes para desprestigiar a Adela por dejar plantado a su amigo. Ernesto es un pervertido que convenció a su hijastra de encerrarla en un sótano como esclava sexual.

programme.title: Caso Cerrado
programme.desc: Al hijo de Érika y Guillermo lo secuestran, le sacan los órganos y los rellenan con droga. También, Erik contrata a Karla para hacer una encuesta sobre el tamaño de los penes.

programme.title: Caso Cerrado
programme.desc: Miguel le dio dinero a Carmelo para que lo guarde, pero su amigo ya no lo tiene. Por otro lado, su hermano menor se prostituye por dinero, pero ella es la mayor y quiere rescatar a su hermana.

programme.title: Caso Cerrado

programme.title: Amistad

programme.title: Treintona, soltera y fantástica

programme.title: La boda de Valentina

programme.title: Soltera a los 30
programme.desc: Cuando Kate cumple 30 años, sus amigas Evie y Charlie se ofrecen a hacer una fiesta, pero la fiesta se sale de control.

programme.title: Terminator: El exterminador

programme.title: Ejecutor
programme.desc: Despedido hace algún tiempo del FBI, Mark Kaminsky se pone en contacto con su anterior jefe, Shannon, cuyo hijo ha sido asesinado. Decidido a encontrar al asesino, Shannon necesita la ayuda de Kaminsky y se ofrece a reincorporarlo si tiene éxito.

programme.title: Regreso al infierno
programme.desc: Cuando período de servicio en Irak llega a su fin, cuatro soldados estadounidenses se enteran de que están programados pare emprender una misión final. Una misión profética que cambiará eternamente el concepto que tenían hasta ahora de guerra.

programme.title: Enemigo al acecho

programme.title: Rescate al amanecer
programme.desc: Durante la guerra de Vietnam, el piloto americano, Dieter Dengler (Christian Bale) es derribado y tomado prisionero por el Vietcong. Durante su cautiverio, le tocó vivir una de las experiencias más notables y horrorosas de toda la guerra.

programme.title: Ejecutor
programme.desc: Despedido hace algún tiempo del FBI, Mark Kaminsky se pone en contacto con su anterior jefe, Shannon, cuyo hijo ha sido asesinado. Decidido a encontrar al asesino, Shannon necesita la ayuda de Kaminsky y se ofrece a reincorporarlo si tiene éxito.

programme.title: La habitación

programme.title: Perfectos desconocidos
programme.desc: Cuando un grupo de mejores amigos se reúne durante un eclipse lunar para compartir una cena íntima en la elegante casa de Eva y Antonio, sospechan que se trata de otra noche cualquiera hasta que la anfitriona les propone un juego.

programme.title: Ilusiones S.A.
programme.desc: Para hacer feliz a su mujer, un hombre contrata a una empresa que crea fantasías para fingir que su nieto, quien los dejó hace años, es un hombre de bien. Pero el verdadero nieto, quien es en realidad un delincuente, se aparece exigiendo dinero.

programme.title: Una última y nos vamos
programme.desc: Un grupo de mariachis salen de casa por primera vez para competir en un certamen nacional en la ciudad de México. Los 8 hombres tienen que soportar muchos desafíos, lo que parece ser una oportunidad de su vida, pronto podría conducir al final del grupo.

programme.title: Me late chocolate
programme.desc: Después de que su prometido muere inesperadamente, una mujer decide aceptar la vida y seguir su sueño de trabajar con chocolate.

programme.title: Todos queremos a alguien
programme.desc: Karla Souza interpreta a una joven doctora soltera en Los Ángeles quien está dividida entre dos amantes y dos posibles amores, en esta divertida comedia romántica bilingüe.

programme.title: Una última y nos vamos
programme.desc: Un grupo de mariachis salen de casa por primera vez para competir en un certamen nacional en la ciudad de México. Los 8 hombres tienen que soportar muchos desafíos, lo que parece ser una oportunidad de su vida, pronto podría conducir al final del grupo.

programme.title: Mimic 3: sentinel
programme.desc: Los bichos están de regreso en la tercera parte de Mimic. Después de que un grupo de personas comienzan a desaparecer, un hombre hipersensible a los gérmenes y confinado a una burbuja protectora pretende ser detective y descifrar el fenómeno.

programme.title: Estación zombi
programme.desc: Una desgarradora película de terror y suspenso zombi, que sigue a un grupo de pasajeros aterrorizados que se abren camino a través de un brote viral en todo el país.

programme.title: Pandemia lupina
programme.desc: Un joven fotógrafo de vida silvestre arriba al aeropuerto JFK infectado con una enfermedad extraña. Haciendo fila en la aduana, de repente se convierte en un hombre lobo. Las víctimas a las que muerde no mueren, sino que también se transforman.

programme.title: Drácula 2000
programme.desc: El maestro del terror Wes Craven presenta una adaptación moderna y sexy del clásico thriller gótico. Luego de que Drácula despierta de su sueño de 100 años, su primer destino es Estados Unidos y la exótica ciudad de Nueva Orleans.

programme.title: Sabor a sangre y chocolate
programme.desc: Adaptación del relato de la autora Annette Curtis Klause acerca de una joven loba adolescente, que debe elegir entre su amor por un joven humano muy lindo y honrar la lealtad de la manada.

programme.title: Tierra de vampiros
programme.desc: Estados Unidos es una nación perdida. Cuando se desata una epidemia de vampirismo y su familia es asesinada, el joven Martin (Connor Paolo) se vuelve el protegido de un canoso y obstinado cazador (Nick Damici) cuya nueva presa son los muertos vivientes.

programme.title: Tierra de vampiros II
programme.desc: Tras el asesinato de su familia, Martin se adentra en las tierras baldías de Estados Unidos en busca de Mister con la esperanza de volver a asociarse con él para combatir una nueva amenaza de vampiros.

programme.title: De fiesta en las alturas
programme.desc: Un elenco estelar, que incluye a Tom Arnold, Kevin Hart, Method Man y Snoop Dogg se apodera de los cielos en esta irreverente comedia sobre una aerolínea que ofrece sensuales sobrecargos, casino y el antro de moda a ¡10,000 metros de altura!

programme.title: La chica de rojo
programme.desc: Cuando Teddy se cruza con una mujer que usa un provocativo vestido de seda rojo, descubre que ella es la modelo elegida por su agencia para una nueva campaña. Desde entonces, el sueño de Teddy será tener un romance con ella.

programme.title: Último viaje a Las Vegas
programme.desc: Cuatro mejores amigos de toda la vida van a Las Vegas para dejar de portarse como adultos de su edad y revivir sus días de gloria. Al llegar, se dan cuenta de que las décadas transformaron Sin City y pusieron a prueba su amistad de manera impensada.

programme.title: Duplex
programme.desc: Los jóvenes y vibrantes neoyorquinos Alex y Nancy encontraron un lugar perfecto para establecerse y compartir un futuro brillante: la planta baja de un hermoso y viejo dúplex. Pero su nuevo hogar viene con un accesorio permanente que no esperaban.

programme.title: ¿Solo amigos?
programme.desc: Harto de malas relaciones, Wallace (Daniel Radcliffe), que abandonó su carrera de medicina, decide poner su vida amorosa en pausa. Tras enamorarse de Chantry (Zoe Kazan), una animadora que vive con su novio Ben (Rafe Spall), el "amor" se complica.

programme.title: Último viaje a Las Vegas
programme.desc: Cuatro mejores amigos de toda la vida van a Las Vegas para dejar de portarse como adultos de su edad y revivir sus días de gloria. Al llegar, se dan cuenta de que las décadas transformaron Sin City y pusieron a prueba su amistad de manera impensada.

programme.title: Duplex
programme.desc: Los jóvenes y vibrantes neoyorquinos Alex y Nancy encontraron un lugar perfecto para establecerse y compartir un futuro brillante: la planta baja de un hermoso y viejo dúplex. Pero su nuevo hogar viene con un accesorio permanente que no esperaban.

programme.title: Invitation to a Gunfighter
programme.desc: Screen legend Yul Brynner turns in a magnificent performance as a gunfighter who must do battle with his most formidable adversary - his own conscience - in this gripping, double-barreled western full of surprise twists and colorful villainy.

programme.title: A Fistful Of Dynamite
programme.desc: The results are explosive when an Irish terrorist (James Coburn) with a dynamite obsession teams up with a Mexican peasant-turned-revolutionary (Rod Steiger) in this action-packed tale of power and politics. Directed by the legendary Sergio Leone.

programme.title: Duel at Diablo
programme.desc: Frontier scout Jess Remsberg leads a wagon train through hostile territory to Fort Conchos. But underneath his valor, he has an ulterior motive: to settle a score with the man he believes killed his wife. James Garner and Sidney Poitier star.

programme.title: The Legend Of the Lone Ranger
programme.desc: The sole surviving Texas Ranger of an ambush arranged by the outlaw leader Butch Cavandish returns to fight back as a great masked western hero - The Lone Ranger.

programme.title: Doc
programme.desc: Stacy Keach, Haris Yulin, and Faye Dunaway give riveting performances in this controversial and myth-shattering reexamination of the darker side of gunslinger Doc Holliday and the actions that led to the infamous showdown in Tombstone, Arizona.

programme.title: Hour Of The Gun
programme.desc: Director John Sturges presents a reworking of the Wyatt Earp/Doc Holliday legend and the struggle for political control of Tombstone, with a marvelous trio of antagonists: James Garner as Earp, Jason Robards as Holliday, and Robert Ryan as Clanton.

programme.title: Marty
programme.desc: Ernest Borgnine won a Best Actor Oscar for his role as a Bronx butcher who gives up on love, until he meets an equally lonely school teacher in this charming story that garnered a total of four Oscars including Best Picture.

programme.title: Sweet Smell of Success
programme.desc: A columnist and a press agent tear into the maelstrom of midtown Manhattan's night creatures in a sinister game that involves money, power and ultimately survival.

programme.title: 12 Angry Men
programme.desc: Eleven jurors are convinced that the defendant is guilty of murder. The twelfth has no doubt of his innocence. How can this one man steer the others toward the same conclusion? Henry Fonda and Lee J. Cobb lead the all-star cast in this classic!

programme.title: Paths of Glory
programme.desc: This powerful, fact-based absurdity-of-war film stars Kirk Douglas as a commanding officer who defends three scapegoats on trial for a failed offensive that occurred within the French Army in 1916.

programme.title: The Great Escape
programme.desc: Steve McQueen, James Garner, and Richard Attenborough headline a stellar cast in one of the most ingenious and suspenseful adventure films of all time as a team of Allied soldiers mount a daring escape from an inescapable Nazi POW camp.

programme.title: The Train
programme.desc: Screen greats Burt Lancaster, Paul Scofield and Jeanne Moreau star in this suspense-laden tale of justice and retribution as a French Resistance fighter (Lancaster) attempts to stop a Nazi commander from looting the art treasures of Paris.

programme.title: Sands of Iwo Jima

programme.desc: Se encontró el cuerpo de una mujer joven y una pequeña fibra en la ropa de la víctima llevó a la policía de San Diego directamente al asesino más improbable.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: En 1988, se descubrió el cuerpo de una mujer joven en un río de Ohio. La mayor parte de la evidencia había sido borrada, pero el hijo de 6 años de la víctima, sin saberlo, les dijo a los investigadores todo lo que necesitaban saber.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos: Sombra de duda
programme.desc: Una mujer es asesinada a tiros en su tienda solo un día antes de testificar contra el hombre acusado de robarla.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos: Cuatro caminos
programme.desc: Una mujer nativa americana fue brutalmente asesinada en el desierto de Nuevo México y la escena del crimen estaba llena de evidencia forense.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: En la víspera de Navidad de 2005, se encuentra el cuerpo de un hombre ardiendo cerca de Baltimore. Finalmente fue identificado como Wesley Person, de 26 años.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos: Un embrague de testigos
programme.desc: Dos testigos presenciales pueden tener la llave de la muerte de un miembro de una pandilla de motociclistas.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos: Evidencia del Jefe
programme.desc: Se detalla el asesinato en Seattle de 1996 de la pareja suburbana Raquel Rivera y Jay Johnson. La evidencia del perro, Chief, de la pareja finalmente vincula a uno de los asesinos a la escena.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: En 2006, Kathy Augustine, una política de Nevada, murió misteriosamente durante una campaña de reelección. El médico forense no pudo aislar la causa de la muerte ni explicar las pequeñas heridas punzantes descubiertas durante la autopsia.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: En 1993, la joven madre, Tammy Tatum, fue encontrada agredida sexualmente y asesinada en su departamento de Longmont, Colorado.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: La mujer había sido agredida sexualmente, apuñalada repetidamente y dada por muerta.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: Un violador en serie anda suelto en una ciudad de Texas. Nadie sabía dónde atacaría a continuación, pero la audacia de sus ataques y la escalada de violencia contra sus víctimas hicieron que encontrarlo fuera imperativo.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: Después de que aparecen 10 cuerpos en Florida, una víctima – Lisa McVey de 17 años de edad – es secuestrada pero liberada. Ella lleva a la policía al autor del crimen, Bobbie Joe Long.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos: Una Bolsa de Evidencia
programme.desc: Se investiga el asesinato de Jessica Knott, de 9 años. Los investigadores usan una bolsa de basura para conectar al sospechoso James Edward Crow, Jr. con el crimen.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: En 1996, más de una docena de niños en Seattle, Washington, luchaban por sus vidas. Cada uno de ellos había contraído una enfermedad grave desconocida. Después de que uno murió, los investigadores sabían que el reloj estaba corriendo.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: Mark Fair se fue a trabajar y su prometida, Karla Brown, se quedó en casa. Más tarde, la encontró muerta. Durante la autopsia, se volvieron a examinar las marcas de mordeduras en su cuerpo y la odontología forense identificó al asesino.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos: Pista elemental
programme.desc: Cuando dos mujeres del mismo pueblo fueron asesinadas de la misma manera, la policía temió que un asesino en serie estuviera suelto.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos: Dentro de un cabello
programme.desc: Una mirada retrospectiva al caso del violador de River Park, que asaltó a cuatro mujeres en South Bend, Indiana, durante 1996. Los agentes del orden arrestaron a Richard Alexander, quien fue declarado culpable en 1998 y sentenciado a 70 años de prisión.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos: Programado para el desastre
programme.desc: Una mujer de 29 años murió instantáneamente cuando una bomba explotó en su casa. El dispositivo era tan poderoso que la metralla estaba incrustada en las casas al otro lado de la calle.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: Timothy Wilson Spencer fue identificado como el hombre que violó y estranguló a cinco jóvenes mujeres en Virginia. Con el uso de perfiles de ADN, se libera a un hombre inocente y se condena al verdadero asesino.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: En 1989, los cadáveres de Joan Rogers y sus dos hijas adolescentes fueron encontrados flotando en la Bahía de Tampa.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: La investigación sobre una estudiante universitaria desaparecida lleva a la policía a descubrir que, sin que sus amigos lo supieran, vivía una extraña doble vida, asistía a la escuela de día y trabajaba como prostituta de noche.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos

programme.desc: Terri's sure that no guy will ever want her and she wants to skip the school dance. Spinner seems interested in her though, and Ashley and Paige convince her to let them make her over.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation

programme.title: Primeval
programme.desc: While trying to capture a Utahraptor on the loose in a shopping mall, Cutter's gun jams and the raptor escapes.

programme.title: Primeval
programme.desc: Jenny Lewis, a cynical PR guru, joins Cutter and the team but is horrified when she gets a taste of the new job.

programme.title: Primeval
programme.desc: Cutter and the team investigate when a young man is found savaged to death at an adventure park. Cutter then comes face to face with the sabre-toothed tiger responsible.

programme.title: Primeval
programme.desc: A teenage boy is dragged into a drain when an anomaly opens underwater. In their attempts to rescue the boy, the team come across sinister creatures from the future.

programme.title: Primeval
programme.desc: A young girl finds herself in a new world of deserts and twinkling stars when she chases her dog through an anomaly.

programme.title: Primeval
programme.desc: The team are faced with capturing a giant Columbian mammoth which has emerged through an anomaly and is causing a rampage on a busy motorway.

programme.title: Primeval
programme.desc: Leek releases a Silurian scorpion at a busy beach after having trapped the rest of the team in his bunker.

programme.title: Attenborough and the Giant Dinosaur
programme.desc: David Attenborough tells the story of the discovery and reconstruction in Argentina of the world's largest known dinosaur, a brand new species of titanosaur. Measuring 37m long, it now holds the record as the biggest animal ever to walk the earth.

programme.title: Planet Dinosaur
programme.desc: It is only in recent years that experts have unearthed the biggest dinosaurs that ever lived. One monster eclipsed all others, more than seven times as heavy as diplodocus was the immense argentinosaurus.

programme.title: Planet Dinosaur
programme.desc: A new generation of carnivores was about to take killing to the next level. At the end of the Cretaceous period, these new hunter killers had spread throughout the globe.

programme.title: Planet Dinosaur
programme.desc: A look at bizarre dinosaurs such as the curious buck-toothed Exipdexipteryx, the amazing four-winged Microraptor and the pot-bellied Nothronychus.

programme.title: Horizon
programme.desc: In 2000, scientists made a groundbreaking discovery, explaining how birds evolved from dinosaurs. However, a deeper investigation put a question mark over everything.

programme.title: Horizon
programme.desc: Exploring a dinosaur graveyard in Patagonia to gain a better understanding of dinosaur evolution, particularly the Middle Jurassic period when they became gigantic.

programme.title: Living with Dinosaurs
programme.desc: David Attenborough learns that descendants of the dinosaur age are alive and well. David explores how they survived the catastrophes that wiped out other species.

programme.title: Classic Doctor Who: Terminus
programme.desc: As Terminus prepares to jettison its reactors, can the Doctor wrest the TARDIS free of the disease-ridden space station or is it truly the end of the Universe?

programme.title: Classic Doctor Who: Enlightenment
programme.desc: The TARDIS's power is drained away just as the Doctor receives a dire warning from the White Guardian, and before long finds himself drawn into a strange race throgh the stars...

programme.title: Classic Doctor Who: Enlightenment
programme.desc: While Tegan has to cope with the unwelcome attention of Marriner, the Doctor realises that Striker and his officers are Eternals and that the human crew mean nothing to them...

programme.title: Classic Doctor Who: Enlightenment
programme.desc: Captain Wrack manipulates Turlough, because she is also working for the Black Guardian and during an Eternals party she places a bomb aboard Striker's ship.

programme.title: Classic Doctor Who: Enlightenment
programme.desc: The race for the Enlightenment is over and a winner has been crowned. But Turlough must make a decision and it's one the Doctor and Tegan cannot help him with...

programme.title: Doctor Who: The King's Demons
programme.desc: At a medieval joust between Frenchman Sir Gilles and Hugh Fitzwilliam, the TARDIS appears. King John seems more curious than alarmed, as is Sir Gilles...

programme.title: Doctor Who: The King's Demons

programme.title: Classic Doctor Who: The Five Doctors

programme.title: Classic Doctor Who: The Five Doctors

programme.title: Classic Doctor Who: The Five Doctors
programme.desc: The Doctors confront the traitor in Rassilon's Tomb, but even victory will have consequences for the Doctor.

programme.title: Doctor Who: Resurrection Of The Daleks

programme.title: Doctor Who: Resurrection Of The Daleks

programme.desc: As the prison station survivors fight the invaders, the Dalek agents on Earth take extreme measures to protect the time corridor from being used by the Doctor’s friends.

programme.title: Doctor Who: The Caves of Androzani
programme.desc: Salateen tells Peri and the Doctor they are dying from spectrox tomaemia.

programme.title: Doctor Who: The Caves of Androzani

programme.title: Doctor Who: The Caves of Androzani

programme.title: Doctor Who: The Twin Dilemma

programme.title: Doctor Who: The Twin Dilemma

programme.title: Doctor Who: The Twin Dilemma
programme.desc: Mestor claims that all he wants is for the Sylvest twins to help him repopulate his home planet but the Doctor knows there’s more to this than meets the eye...

programme.title: Doctor Who: The Twin Dilemma
programme.desc: Mestor’s true plan is revealed and the Doctor's old Gallifreyan friend Azmael comes to the realisation that he has been corrupted long enough by the Gastropod leader...

programme.title: Doctor Who: Attack of the Cybermen
programme.desc: The Cybermen are hiding in the London sewers and turning humans into semi-cybernetic slaves. On Telos, two slaves make a bid for freedom and find a way to escape the planet for good.

programme.title: Doctor Who: Attack of the Cybermen
programme.desc: On Telos, the Doctor is reintroduced to the Cyber Leader and meets the Cryons, the planet’s original inhabitants who want their planet back and will go to any lengths to do so…

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: A German shepherd and Welsh corgi mix has dog aggression; a blind Lab chases his tail when he is around food.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: An aggressive bulldog; a beagle/terrier mix with a fear of trash cans; a Lab mix who starts to exhibit anxiety outside.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: A pit bull is aggressive toward strangers; a Rottweiler/Shar-Pei mix must get his aggression under control or be euthanized.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: A ridgeback/boxer mix's high energy develops into severe aggression; a couple's whippets bark and lunge at any dog that comes inside the boutique.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Daschund Lotus is very territorial; his aggression sends his owner Chari to the hospital; Cesar makes a house call to see Joey, a German Shepard who is territorial over the second story of his owner's home.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: A French bulldog is nervous around other dogs and occasionally nips at people; a Vizsla who resists going outside due to her fear of cars.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: A couple's Chihuahua mix terrorizes their mastiff and dominates the house; a pit bull is not growing out of his puppy behavior.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: A Labrador mix with dog aggression; a Jack Russell terrier and a Queensland heeler whose formerly cordial relationship has become hostile.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer

programme.title: Dog Whisperer

programme.title: Dog Whisperer

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
