programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog is trying to cut down on smoking, but it's not easy with his high-stress job. Today, he must track down Walter, a fugitive who believes that the Canadian military has planted a chip in his teeth that allows him to communicate with his van.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Beth designs a luxurious new office for the team and shows it off to Dog, but the bounty hunter is more interested in starting his hunt for Federico, who's been revoked for missing court dates and generally running amuck.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog goes on his a case, which involves Bobby, who's been on parole for three months pending sentencing on an assault charge. Bobby's girlfriend wants him back in jail, and Dog agrees that the Bobby needs to be behind bars.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog pursues two people whose lives have been ruined by drugs. First, he tracks Mae, who traded a good home and loving family for an ice pipe. The next case involves Jude. His addiction has caused his pregnant wife to fear for her safety.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog is a rough, tough bounty hunter, but he's a softie at heart, as the two cases in this episode show.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog answers two very different calls for help from women. In the first case, he helps Leland protect Maria, who's being threatened by her violent husband. Then Dog visit a young woman who's dying and has asked to see Dog as one of her final wishes.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Baby Lyssa, who's just turned 18 and is studying to become a bondsman, gets to do some on-the-job training when she helps Dog hunt for Wayne, who's run out on a bond for second-degree assault.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog is sick as a dog, but he still must lead the hunt for a fugitive named James. James' girlfriend tries to cover for him, but Dog surprises James in his bedroom and leads him away in cuffs.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Beth buys Dog a shirt with an embroidered chicken, but Dog explains he only wears shirts with pictures of either Jesus or a Harley-Davidson. When it's time to go to work, the team goes after Necia, a fugitive with felony charges pending.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: It's Christmas day, and Dog sets out to nab Raymond, who robs to support his ice habit, and give him a little Christmas gift - shiny new handcuffs.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog and Beth must go after their former housekeeper, Lisa, who's jumped bond. They know this case will be tricky because Lisa knows everyone in the family. Luckily, Beth's nephew, Jason, is visiting and is quickly put to work as the bait.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Before Tim heads out for a tough day of bounty hunting, he likes to get in a little quality time with his daughter, Summer Rain.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: After giving a rousing speech to an audience of enthusiastic grade-schoolers, Dog catches up with an old friend, Sheriff Tommy Cayetano, to talk business. Dog's got a tough fugitive, named Mia, to catch and Tommy is happy to lend a hand.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog knows very little about Peter, but what he does know, he doesn't like! Not only is he currently facing two counts of second degree sexual assault, about week ago, he dropped out of sight before missing his court date.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: It's the day before Valentine's Day and love is in the air at Da Kine Bail Bonds--but not for Tapi who has failed to appear in court on theft charges. Dog's plan is to have Leland knock on Tapi's door with a Valentine's gift to draw her out.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog and Beth are finally getting married! They've been together for more than ten years, but Dog is determined, as he puts it, to "marry his common law wife the Christian way.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog, Beth are off to the Big Island for their wedding. They hope to relax for a few days but it turns out Leland has a fugitive he needs to catch and despite the time limit, neither Dog nor Beth can resist the opportunity to catch a fugitive.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog and the team must deal with misleading informants, belligerent boaters, and angry drunks when they go after Kimberly, a traffic offender with over 20 violations. And if that isn't enough, Dog has another problem -- Duane Lee is sick.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: When the team hunts for Steven, a fugitive with a history of domestic abuse, they seek help from his girlfriend, who's been a victim of his abuse. Meanwhile, Beth trains for a 5K race to help raise awareness about domestic abuse.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog is going to be the keynote speaker at the annual Profession Bail Agents convention in Las Vegas, but before he leaves he's got to clear two cases from his docket--Heidi and Stephanie.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Tim's got a big problem. Owen has failed to appear in court. He's on bond for serious drug charges and now Tim could lose $30,000 if he doesn't catch Owen. With Dog's help he tries to track down the co-signer but they come up dry.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: It's been raining for days and the team is going a little stir-crazy, but Dog has the cure; a good hunt. Maui has failed to appear on a drug charge and the team has just one lead. She was recently spotted during a bust at a local chop shop garage.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog decides it's time to outfit the Da Kine crew with new SUVs. After a quick visit to their local dealership, they go after Jasmine, a woman whose criminal record includes over 37 arrests for everything from drug promotion to assault.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog has two fugitives to catch, and he gets help from the unlikeliest sources--the fugitives' mothers. First, Ginger's mother wants to revoke her daughter's bond. Then Brandon's mother decides to revoke his bond because Brandon has an ice habit.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog is back hunting in the big city of Denver, but chasing fugitives on the mainland is more dangerous than ever. So Dog decides that the crew should get pepper-ball guns, which have much better range than pepper spray.

programme.desc: Fancy dancing; girl hits the lamplight; watch the chair.

programme.title: The Pet Collective: Doggython
programme.desc: It's a Doggython! Sit back for 2 hours of The Pet Collective's best dogs.

programme.title: Animal Attractions
programme.desc: Our Dog Trainer, Ronald White, turns an "out of order" Beagle named Quincy into a law-abiding pup. Do you want to adopt an adult pet? We've got some tips for you.

programme.title: Pet Obsessed: Impawsters
programme.desc: Don't be suspicious. No, don't be suspicious.

programme.title: The Yorkshire Vet
programme.desc: Julian is called out to a calf with a large lump, while other patients include a pair of pygmy goats, a farm full of feral cats, and Fern, a sick spaniel. The staff also find time to spring a birthday surprise on Peter Wright.

programme.title: Pet Obsessed
programme.desc: Featuring ridiculous clips, digital shorts and tons of fluff; these are the internet's most outrageous and outspoken pets... A.K.A. your newest obsession!

programme.title: To The Rescue
programme.desc: Tommy rides with Houston Pets Alive! to rescue at-risk dogs from local shelters, ensuring they find loving homes. Featuring Kristen and her co-pilot dog Mogley, their story highlights the transformative power of a second chance.

programme.title: The Yorkshire Vet
programme.desc: Julian gets a panic-stricken call from Alpaca farmer, Jackie Barlow. Two of her alpacas, Gavroche and Francesca, have sneaked into the barn and gorged themselves on the food stash. They’re struggling to breathe, foaming at the mouth and choking.

programme.title: The Yorkshire Vet
programme.desc: Peter has an emergency at the practice in Kirkbymoorside, when a local farming couple rush in their pregnant Texel ewe. Julian operates on a terrier suffering with bladder stones. Peter visits the Green's farm to see a lonely donkey.

programme.title: Animal Attractions
programme.desc: Our Pet Trainer 911 keeps one family afloat by teaching their giant Schnauzer pool manners. Can you train your cat to be a circus star? Our Pet Vet hands out healthy tips for your overweight cat.

programme.title: Pick A Puppy
programme.desc: The Scaife family is looking for a puppy to keep up with their three energetic kids. How will they ever decide between the Australian Labradoodle, the Bouvier and the Miniature Schnauzer?

programme.title: The Yorkshire Vet
programme.desc: A much-loved trekking lama, Gus, has an excruciatingly painful problem. An orphaned kitten could have life-changing injuries. Julian’s beloved Jack Russell, Emmie, gets into a skirmish. To relocate a male deer, Peter must use a highly dangerous dart gun.

programme.title: 2019 AKC National Rally Championships
programme.desc: Part 1 of The AKC National Rally Championships 2019

programme.title: The Yorkshire Vet
programme.desc: Peter tries to save a cow who has suffered a huge prolapse after giving birth. With the newborn calf depending on her mum, the pressure is on.

programme.title: Dynasty
programme.desc: Tensions between Krystle and Blake mount as their suspicions of one another grow. Claudia regrets sleeping with Adam. Dominique derails Alexis' attempt to buy out her company but is unable to stop Brady's divorce proceedings.

programme.title: Dynasty
programme.desc: Dominique remains in critical condition after collapsing. Luke pays an unexpected visit to Steven. Blake tells his son that he will support him regardless of his sexual persuasion. Alexis calls her former lover, King Galen, a Middle Eastern monarch.

programme.title: Dynasty
programme.desc: Alexis attempts to persuade King Galen to allow a marriage between Amanda and his son. She sweetens the offer by suggesting his country would receive a portion of Colbyco's revenues. Dominique advises Krystle to reconcile with Blake.

programme.title: Dynasty
programme.desc: Alexis is relieved and Blake is concerned when Amanda suddenly changes her mind and decides to marry Prince Michael. Sammy Jo is revealed to be the culprit behind the compromising photographs.

programme.title: Dynasty
programme.desc: Claudia flies to Mexico to divorce Steven. Unexpectedly, Adam appears at her hotel and they spend the night together. After Amanda embarrasses Prince Michael at Dominique's party, his patience is exhausted and he leaves her.

programme.title: Dynasty
programme.desc: Blake and Daniel survive the plane crash. Jeff charters a helicopter and braves hazardous conditions to finally locate the wreckage. Krystle and Blake finally clear the air and renew their commitment to each other.

programme.title: Dynasty
programme.desc: Krystle accompanies Daniel to New York for his reunion with Sammy Jo, the child he's never known. While looking through photos Ashley snapped on assignment at a rock concert, Jeff is stunned to spot Fallon among the crowd.

programme.title: Dynasty
programme.desc: As Alexis and Amanda emerge from an exclusive bridal salon, a car suddenly screeches to a halt and Amanda is pulled inside. A high-speed chase ensues. As Dex forces the kidnapper's car onto the sidewalk, Amanda breaks free.

programme.title: Dynasty
programme.desc: Dex tells a devastated Krystle that Daniel Reece is dead. Steven is outraged when Sammy Jo decides to fight for custody of her son in court. Jeff proposes marriage to Ashley. Sammy Jo learns that her monies will be held in trust with Krystle as executor.

programme.title: Dynasty
programme.desc: Elena confesses to Amanda that nothing happened in the bedroom with Prince Michael. Sammy Jo fits her roommate Rita with a blonde wig and has her practice duplicating Krystle's voice. Fallon has chosen a new name and heads for Denver.

programme.title: Dynasty
programme.desc: Those surviving the massacre in Moldavia are separated and held at the palace; Krystle and Alexis are imprisoned in the palace dungeon; Sammy Jo reveals her scheme to Rita; Fallon, suffering from amnesia, reacts to seeing the name Colby.

programme.title: Dynasty
programme.desc: Blake secures the release of Krystle and Alexis, and the families return from Moldavia; Luke is buried; Rita's boyfriend Joel is anxious to help Sammy Jo further her scheme; Alexis is preoccupied with Galen's welfare; Fallon tells Miles she has amnesia.

programme.title: Dynasty

programme.title: Forensic Files

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A woman is shot to death in her store just one day before she is to testify against the man accused of robbing her. The robber becomes the prime suspect, but he has a solid alibi: a timestamped videotape of his activities on the day of the murder.

programme.title: Forensic Files

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When a car was found in a drainage ditch with two bodies inside, a fingertip torn from a latex glove would point investigators to both the crime scene and the killer.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: This killer probably hoped to cover his tracks by staging the crime scene. But investigators saw through the attempt almost immediately and turned to forensic science to learn what really happened that night.

programme.title: Forensic Files

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: They thought the fire would cover their crime. But one tiny clue, no bigger than a thumbtack, remained. It held all the information investigators needed to put a trio of cold-blooded killers behind bars.

programme.title: Forensic Files

programme.title: Forensic Files

programme.desc: Prompted by news of a flight attendant's brutal murder, the son of a previous victim contacts police. Both murders have similar MOs, and biological evidence proves that these were serial killings.

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: Suburbanite Lucy gets a green thumb and a competitive spirit. She has been raising tulips with a vengeance and wants to dethrone her neighbor Betty Ramsey for "Best Looking Garden" in the local garden club competition.

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: The town of Westport has commissioned a statue of a Minuteman to commemorate the Revolutionary War. The whole town is involved, from Fred who will serve as town crier to Ricky who will make the dedication speech.

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: To celebrate the Mertzes' wedding anniversary, Fred and Ricky want to go to a prizefight, but the girls want to get dressed up and go to a nightclub. An argument ensues and Lucy threatens to find two other escorts if their husbands won't take them.

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: Lucy decides Ricky's love is growing cold so she takes Ethel's advice she learned from a book, How to Keep the Honeymoon from Ending. Her attempt to dress up for breakfast doesn't yield any response from Ricky.

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: One of the girls in Ricky's show quits, creating a vacancy which Lucy wants to fill. She goes down for an audition and can have the part provided she loses twelve ponds in four days to fit into the previous singer's size 12 outfit.

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: Lucy is reading "The Mockingbird Murder Mystery" when Ethel reads her fortune and tells her death is near. Later she overhears a conversation between Ricky and his agent and she jumps to the wrong conclusion that he's trying to do away with her.

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: When Ricky cuts off Lucy's allowance and charge accounts because of her careless spending, Lucy finds herself short of funds. Ethel has tickets to a radio quiz show that has a cash prize of $1,000.

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: Network television scouts are going to check out Ricky's band and Lucy tries to "get into the act" in order to be discovered as well. Of course Ricky will not hear of it.

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: Lucy becomes interested in numerology and advises Ricky that it is a good day for him to make any deals he can. However, she soon realizes that she consulted the horoscope from yesterday's newspaper.

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: When Ricky leaves his clothes around the living room, Lucy gets angry and divides the room in half so Ricky can be as messy as he likes - on his side!

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: Ricky brings home a $3,500 mink coat to be used in his nightclub act, and Lucy assumes it's her anniversary present. Trying to get the coat away from her becomes a problem because Lucy not only wears it while she does housework, she even sleeps in it.

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: Ethel Mertz interprets a gossip column item to mean that Ricky is interested in one of the chorus girls in his nightclub. Ricky assures Lucy that it's just publicity.

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: Lucy opens a telegram addressed to Ricky from the War Department ordering him to appear at the Army's Fort Dix. This letter plus the drills Ricky and Fred have been practicing in the living room convince the women that their husbands have been drafted.

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: Lucy learns that Ricky needs a dancer for his Parisian nightclub act and is determined to get the part. Fred offers to teach her how to dance but Ethel arranges instead to have the nephew of the woman who runs the French laundry to give pointers.

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: Ethel wants Ricky to headline a benefit for her women's club. Lucy will only try to arrange it if she is on the bill as well. After hearing Lucy's terrible singing voice, Ethel is less than eager, but eventually agrees.

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: Lucy buys a costly dress, and when Ricky tells her to take it back or pay for it herself, she decides to get a job. She answers an ad for a babysitter and finds herself in charge of high-spirited twin boys who are to appear in an amateur contest.

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: Lucy's neighbor Miss Lewis has a crush on Mr. Ritter, the local grocer but istoo shy to invite him to dinner. Trying to play Cupid, Lucy invites him for her but he gets the idea that Lucy has fallen for him. Apparently Mr. Ritter is fond of Lucy as well.

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: In a deception planned to convince Ricky that she ought to be in his new nightclub act, Lucy pretends to have a nervous breakdown. She consults a book on abnormal psychology that reveals three complexes she assumes.

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: Lucy decides to break into show business by writing a play about a Cuban tobacco picker and entering it in her women's club play competition. Of course she wants Ricky to star in it but he refuses.

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: The Mertzes enjoy an evening singing around the piano with the Ricardos in their apartment. When they retire for the night and Lucy and Ricky continue singing, Ethel phones them demanding quiet.

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: Ricky needs a ballet dancer and a burlesque comic for his club's new musical revue. Lucy wants the ballet gig and takes dance lessons from a strict instructor. Learning the disciplined art is much more difficult than she imagined.

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: Peggy, a teenage neighbor, breaks up with her boyfriend Arthur because she is infatuated with Ricky. Lucy tries to help the clumsy schoolboy learn how to dance in order to win back Peggy's affections. To complicate matters more, Arthur falls for Lucy.

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: Lucy and Ethel are eager to get a closer look at the belongings of the O'Briens, new neighbors in the building. They snoop around in their apartment while they are away and when they hear the O'Briens return, Lucy is trapped in the closet.

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: After the Mertzes have a quarrel the Ricardos try their best to get them back together. Lucy invites each of them to dinner without the other knowing. The Mertzes finally reconcile but in the process, the Ricardos squabble.

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: Lucy hates the mustache that Ricky grows for a potential movie role and demands that he shave it off. When he refuses, Lucy gets a fake beard and glues it on her face. To teach Ricky a lesson, she kisses her husband with the beard on when he arrives home.

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: When Ricky forbids Lucy from gossiping, she tapes her mouth shut but reveals the latest rumor to Ethel through charades. However, it seems it's the proverbial black pot and kettle when Ricky shares with Fred a spicy tidbit about one of his band members.

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: Lucy and Ethel are tired of their dishpan hands and demand dishwashers from their husbands. They also don't think the Society Matrons League, a club they want to join, would approve. Their husbands believe they have it easy compared to the olden days.

programme.desc: Benny's previous career with the district attorney's office comes into focus when Chunk aims to get a new trial for a man he believes was wrongfully convicted of triple homicide by a prosecution team that included Benny.

programme.title: Bull
programme.desc: Bull helps a famous social media influencer take her father to court to overturn his legal guardianship over her empire, which he was granted after the young mogul suffered a public mental breakdown.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: The Hemingway Papers

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Napoleon's Dictionary

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: From Siberia With Love

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: An international soccer game is taking place in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil and Lupin has his eyes on the box office and betting takes. Will the box office heist go as planned?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: An old man who supposedly knows the secret to Hitler's legacy lives in East Germany within the Berlin Wall. Lupin and his gang track the old man down, but the old man can't recall anything about any legacy.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: At Loch Ness in Scotland, the mysterious monster Nessie reveals itself from the lake, charmed by Fujiko's singing. Seeing this, Doctor Oz decides to use Fujiko to capture Nessie for his personal gain.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Fujiko and a mystery man have an enticing job for Lupin: Stealing a ton of gold bullion from a Swiss Bank, a bank renowned for its tight security. Can it be done? What is the mystery man's true identity?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: A man is threatening to destroy the Leaning Tower of Pisa with a device that generates artificial earthquakes. The Italian government has no choice but to meet the culprit's, but Lupin takes the ransom for himself!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin has stolen the golden death mask of Tutankhamen, the ancient Egyptian pharaoh known as the "boy king." However, when Lupin tries on the golden death mask he becomes possessed by an ominous curse.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The Trans Europe Superexpress train has departed Venice and is headed to France. Onboard the Superexpress is crime boss Don Marcino's ill-gotten treasures. Can Lupin and his gang pull off the heist before the train reaches its destination?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin meets the grandson of master Ukiyoe artist, Toushusai Sharaku and learns that he has been switching his own works with his grandfather's originals. Unable to switch the last painting due to illness, he asks Lupin to switch it in his stead.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and Fujiko have been invited to a party hosted by Marcel Dulane, a member of Paris' high society. However, the elegant party turns out to be a trap. Fujiko is taken hostage and Lupin, with a time-bomb belt strapped to his waist…

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2

programme.title: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto
programme.desc: The Land of Birds is in turmoil due to a specter known as the Cursed Warrior, which is believed to be the ghost of Lord Owashi, the previous feudal lord who died suddenly.

programme.title: Naruto
programme.desc: Moso, the late feudal lord’s counselor, and Komei, the chief strategist, are at odds with each other. Neji begins to think that the Cursed Warrior is part of a plot…

programme.title: Naruto
programme.desc: Komei is controlling the Cursed Warrior. Moso thwarts Komei's ambitions. The Leaf team feels uneasy about his motives. Neji doesn't want to get involved, but Naruto is defiant. Gamakichi and Gamatatsu are summoned to investigate…

programme.title: Naruto
programme.desc: Tenten and Neji have no choice but to listen to Kakashi. He senses that their being followed. Komei has been declared a criminal and is to be executed. The Cursed Warrior appears and snatches Komei away.

programme.title: Naruto
programme.desc: Sagi swears to punish Moso himself. Naruto is reminded of Sasuke when he sees Sagi. Neither words nor Naruto's attempts to stop him can deter Sagi from his chosen path of revenge.

programme.title: Naruto
programme.desc: At Moso's mansion, a battle takes place between the Wandering Ninja and a Leaf Ninja. With Chishima's help, Naruto is freed from Moso's genjutsu. Moso then reveals his true form as the leader of the Wandering ninja, Hoki!

programme.title: Naruto
programme.desc: Choji and Naruto are craving Ichiraku's special ramen only to find out that they find the shop closed! Teuchi reveals that his daughter has been kidnapped by Ryonin, aka the Ninja Chefs, who is after his secret recipes!

programme.title: Naruto
programme.desc: The Demon of the Ocean is wreaking havoc in the Land of the Sea. Anko leads a team consisting of Naruto, Ino, and Shino. It turns out Anko has an unexpected history with the Land of the Sea.

programme.title: Naruto
programme.desc: Unable to find Naruto, Anko meets with officials from the Land of the Sea. The ship carrying government funds that they were supposed to guard sets sail the next day!

programme.title: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto
programme.desc: Amachi and his gang begin their attack on the government ship. Naruto and the others escape from Demon Island, but the sight that greets them is the Land of the Sea fleet on the verge of annihilation.

programme.title: Naruto
programme.desc: The Hidden Leaf ninja and Amachi battle it out at sea. With Naruto's help, Amachi is defeated, but then a monster appears. Naruto summons Gamabunta in order to defeat the monster.

programme.title: Naruto
programme.desc: Kunijiro visits Tsunade and decides to have Naruto guide his boy through one day in the life of a ninja!

programme.title: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto

programme.desc: Nye and her boyfriend spent last Easter with her family, but he spent most of it drinking and ignoring her until he left without a trace. Where was he that night? Plus, Jackie admitted to cheating on her boyfriend, but he believes there was more!

programme.desc: Sharina thinks that Clarence is cheating on her because he’s always out late. Plus, Chrystal doesn’t want Earnie’s ex Tenyia to live with them just because she’s the mother of his child.

programme.title: The Steve Wilkos Show
programme.desc: After Cassarah became Tim's live-in nanny, they began a sexual relationship. Her family is livid over the 26 year age gap and claims that he takes her to swingers' parties. Can Steve help Cassarah leave this dysfunctional relationship?

programme.title: The Jerry Springer Show
programme.desc: Carrie's been sleeping with both Greg and Jeremy and is not certain which one is the father of her child. Then, Chris has been sleeping with his brother's fiancee, Kristen, for over a year and is here to get her for himself.

programme.title: The Jerry Springer Show
programme.desc: Annie would not allow her fiancée to have a bachelor party, so he secretly had one. Wayne wants to dump his girlfriend for his internet lover. Later Shawn has fallen for a woman with a big secret!

programme.title: The Jerry Springer Show
programme.desc: Romeo has been Tionne's boyfriend for 8 months, but Romeo is here today to confess he was actually born a "Juliet"! Then Steven brought in a homeless man, Chad, to live with him. But what Steven didn't know is that Chad is also his girlfriend's pimp!

programme.title: The Jerry Springer Show
programme.desc: Our cameras were at home with sisters Olivia and Catherine when Olivia confronted her older sister for sleeping with her boyfriend, Jacob. Next Jeromy has been having an affair with 2 sisters and both are now pregnant!

programme.title: The Jerry Springer Show
programme.desc: Richie will tell Shelly he has been sleeping with DeeDee and Lesley. Then, Gina will confess to her boyfriend, Rob, that she is sleeping with his best friend, Joe!

programme.title: The Jerry Springer Show
programme.desc: Beba is here to confront her cousin for stealing her man. Next Tiffany thinks she is going to marry Brian today but there's a catch. Then Billie may have introduced her longtime love, Arkim, to Tiffanie, but today she wants him for herself.

programme.title: The Jerry Springer Show
programme.desc: Greg will reveal to his girlfriend, Deidra, that he secretly works as a gay, male escort. Madrina's boyfriend keeps cheating on her with his ex. Then Ro-Ro has two girlfriends and today they'll force her to choose between them.

programme.title: The Jerry Springer Show
programme.desc: Stephanie is married and pregnant, but she's not sure if the father is her husband or her boyfriend! Her husband is no hero either because he has a girlfriend too. These guests and others are here to demand a divorce to be with their latest loves.

programme.title: The Jerry Springer Show
programme.desc: Heaven and Justin are here today to confess their infidelity to each other…about the same woman! Next, Joan wants to know why Mistress Flame prefers her line of work!

programme.title: The Jerry Springer Show
programme.desc: Roger has been sleeping with his girlfriend's mother and her aunt too. Next Jeff brought the Springer Cam along to help him bust his wife, Dee Dee. Later Brenda is here to tell her lover's wife that she's about to lose her husband!

programme.title: The Jerry Springer Show
programme.desc: Lynne kicked her husband out for cheating and now he's living in her front yard in a box! Next Sam says he's always wanted to see 2 women sleep together so he made a peculiar agreement with his cousin.

programme.title: El show de Steve Wilkos
programme.desc: Jack está preocupado por sus nietos porque su nuera Carol ha sido negligente y tiene mal genio. Después, Kendra explica por qué de repente dio el bebé de Corey en adopción.

programme.title: El show de Steve Wilkos
programme.desc: La adolescente Megan vive con su antiguo novio controlador Rick. Megan no puede ir a la escuela, buscar trabajo, ni comer sin su permiso. ¿Pueden su tía y Steve lograr hacerla entender?

programme.title: El show de Steve Wilkos
programme.desc: Dennis afirma que su ex-novia Kendal lo mantiene amarrado con mentiras sobre su embarazo. ¡Quiere saber si es el padre de su hija! ¿Finalmente los resultados de la prueba de ADN de Steve les permitirán seguir adelante?

programme.title: El show de Steve Wilkos
programme.desc: Korey está seguro de que su novia Dominique le es infiel y también le preocupa que pueda estar prostituyéndose. Dice que las sospechas han hecho que se vuelva violento. Después, Gregory cree que su novia Robin no le es fiel.

programme.title: El show de Steve Wilkos
programme.desc: Justin está convencido de que su novia Lainie le ha sido infiel, y lo que es más importante, que no es el padre de su hijo. Pero sus propias inseguridades lo han vuelto violento. Además, Steven duda ser padre del hijo de Ashley.

programme.title: El show de Steve Wilkos
programme.desc: Rebecca dejó a su bebé con su prometido James y su madre Adeline, y descubrió que su bebé estaba hospitalizado. Rebecca sospecha que James es el responsable. ¡Adeline la culpa de la muerte del bebé!

programme.title: El show de Steve Wilkos

programme.title: El show de Steve Wilkos
programme.desc: Tras sobrevivir a una loca persecución en coche, perder la pierna y estar en coma a causa de su esposo, Portia finalmente lo confrontará. No admitirá la culpa, pero hoy Steve está ayudando a Portia a hacerse oír.

programme.title: El show de Steve Wilkos
programme.desc: Naomi, de 17 años, ha cambiado repentinamente de actitud y tiene la misión de ser madre. Sus padres, Leeanders y April, necesitan que Steve intervenga.

programme.title: El show de Steve Wilkos

programme.title: El show de Steve Wilkos

programme.title: El show de Steve Wilkos

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Luffy and Ivan mourn the loss of Bon Clay, and Captain Buggy's reputation gets a boost when a phone call from the Marines reveals the secrets of his past.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: While Luffy continues his rescue mission, Nami learns a lesson about how to turn rain into cash, and Franky wakes up in a freezing forest full of ferocious cyborg animals!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Sanji tries to fight his way off a most peculiar island, but his frilly battle costume threatens to awaken his inner maiden. Elsewhere, Chopper tries to avoid being served in a hot pot!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Nico Robin lends her many hands to an overmatched gang of revolutionaries in a frigid land of eternal suffering, and Usopp bulks up to avoid becoming a snack for a hungry, hungry island!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Zoro's attempt to reunite with his friends leads him to a massive tomb and a host of shadowy swordsmen. Elsewhere, Brook uses his status as Satan to get an eyeful of undergarments!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: While the marines prepare for Ace's execution, Luffy looks back on all the good times he shared with his brother, and Jimbei reveals the shocking details of the day Fire Fist Ace went down in defeat!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Luffy and his gang continue on their way to Marineford, but once he arrives, the rubber-man must defeat both Navy Admirals and Warlords of the Sea before he can save Ace!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Citizens and soldiers alike prepare for all-out war as Ace is led to the site of his execution. While the world watches, the true identity of the condemned man's father is shockingly revealed!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Flashbacks reveal the agonizing sacrifice made by Ace's mother in order save his life – and the secret behind his connection to Luffy. Back in the present, Whitebeard makes an unexpected entrance!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: As a massive seaquake rocks Marineford, Ace recalls the ups and downs of his life as a pirate, including his first encounter with Whitebeard – and the unthinkable betrayal that led to his capture!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Whitebeard begins his attack with a tsunami-spawning sea quake, but the marines counter with a blast of frigid air that turns the tidal wave into an iceberg! Will Luffy and his crew arrive in time to join the battle?

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Fire meets ice as mythical warriors, erupting admirals, legendary pirates, and a giant giant go head to head in the biggest, baddest battle of all time! There's only one thing missing: Monkey D. Luffy!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: A towering giant of a giant known as Little Oars Jr. carves a path of death and destruction as he fights to save Ace. The monstrous mauler is within arm's reach of his friend when he's intercepted by the seven warlords of the sea!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: In the wake of Little Oars Junior's tragic defeat, Admiral Sengoku hatches a devious plan to speed up the countdown to Ace's execution. The situation looks beyond bleak until a hero enters the fray from on high!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Luffy appears on the field of battle with a ferocious sense of urgency. Ace could be executed at any minute, and the rubber-man's refusal to back down impresses even the most feared men in all the world!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Luffy leaps into action, attacking the Naval forces with a frantic display of brutality. Meanwhile, Ace watches in horror as an army of zombies rises up to attack his brother!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Supernatural powers take center stage in the battle to save Ace as Luffy and his uniquely talented allies throw down with the Navy's own arsenal of Devil Fruit Eaters!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: A gift from Boa Hancock and Ivan-san's Galaxy Wink get Luffy closer to Ace than ever, but a sword-wielding foe from the past threatens to derail the rescue mission!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Luffy runs into a lethal roadblock in the form of Hawk-Eye Mihawk. The legendary swordsman is determined to halt Luffy's onslaught, but Ivan-san, Boa Hancock, and Jimbei aren't ready to give up the fight!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Luffy and his pirate brethren have their hands full with an ominous army of unbeatable Kumas! While the inhuman minions march onward, Whitebeard encounters a former ally!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Whitebeard is betrayed – and brutally stabbed – by one of his own men! In the wake of this unthinkable act of treason, allegations about the legendary pirate bring the battle to a halt!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Whitebeard shrugs off his injuries and leads a ferocious charge into the heart of the enemy's defenses, but three deadly Admirals join forces to silence his shock wave attack as the pirates find themselves surrounded by impenetrable walls!

programme.title: One Piece

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Wednesday and Pugsley return in tears from trick-or-treating because a neighbor has told them there is no such thing as a witch. Morticia and Gomez plan to prove to the children that they do exist--by summoning a witch to a séance.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Determined to correct the dreadful literature that Wednesday and Pugsley are exposed to, Morticia sets out to create a new literary world. Gomez fears that his wife's first manuscript is so good, that once the publisher reads it he will lose her.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: In need of artistic fulfillment, Morticia takes up sculpting. An art critic views her first endeavor--a three-eyed Gomez statue--and clubs it with his cane. Gomez, who won't have Morticia's heart broken gets a seedy art dealer to buy it.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Pugsley copies one of his dad's old love letters and sends it to his teacher. Miss Dunbar comes to visit the Addams home and confesses to Gomez that no man has ever fallen so in love with her, leading Morticia to pretend to be the jealous wife.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: After Wednesday befriends a new boy her age, Robespierre Courtney, Morticia invites his parents, Mr. and Mrs. Henry Courtney to visit the Addams house for tea. Unbeknownst to them, the Courtney's are hoping to meet a number of the social set.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: There is a neighborhood burglar on the loose, and Morticia has reason to believe it could be Gomez. Morticia decides to probe his subconscious mind for a key to his criminality after she and Uncle Fester discover loot hidden in the storeroom.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Morticia's pet plant Cleopatra gobbles up her favorite photo of Gomez from the family album. When the original photographer is found and asked to make a duplicate picture, it is discovered that he is now with the Department of Motor Vehicles.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Gomez plays host to Don Xavier Molines, a family friend during his childhood in Spain, and his daughter Consuella. Morticia's hospitality is put to the test when Consuella reveals that she has been promised in marriage to Gomez since childhood.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: When Wednesday's and Pugsley's faith in Santa Claus is shaken, Uncle Fester is chosen to back up Santa in case the real St. Nick is too busy to come. However, Fester-Santa gets stuck in the chimney, so each of the other adults fills in for him.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Fester is so smitten upon receipt of a photo of his love, a bearded carnival lady, that he borrows stamp money to mail her a proposal. Morticia dons a beard and poses as the mother to convince Fester that he will have to work to support a wife.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Because she thinks Fester (Jackie Coogan) and Grandmama (Blossom Rock) are spoiling the children, Morticia (Carolyn Jones) hires a governess. Insulted, Fester paints a white line down the center of the Addams house, dividing it in half.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Morticia and Gomez see Fester conferring with TV muscleman Jack LaGrann (Jack LaLanne), and think that Fester is planning a television career. However, Uncle Fester confides to Lurch that he has to go on a secret diet and exercise.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Morticia and Gomez find Grandfather Pegleg's treasure map and summon Captain Grimby. They hope to charter his boat for the treasure hunt. But after meeting the Captain, Morticia is careful to keep the nature of the mission secret.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Ophelia Frump is madly in love with Horatio Bartholomew, the man who has everything, except the truth about her relatives. Morticia, not convinced by Bartholomew, persuades playboy Cousin Itt to stir the embers of his past romance with Ophelia.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Pugsley shocks his parents when he gives up his new atomic reactor as kid stuff and announces that he wants to find his own job. His first try is as a medical assistant to Dr. Bird. He turns up, scalpel in hand, ready to help during an operation.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Grandma Frump (guest star Margaret Hamilton), comes to the mistaken conclusion that her daughter, Morticia (Carolyn Jones), and Gomez (John Astin) plan to pack her off to an old folks home. Actually, they plan to send her to a beauty farm.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Morticia, in order to be part of the National Beautification Program, decides to become a home decorator and offers her services to the neighbors. Next door neighbor, and insurance agent, Joe Digby hires Morticia in hopes of selling them insurance.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Ophelia taunts Uncle Fester into announcing that he is going to join the Peace Corps. Fester feels he's a cinch to be accepted because Gomez plans to pull strings in Washington on his behalf. The entire family agrees to help him study for the exam.

programme.desc: Allyn Joslyn guest-stars as Sam Hilliard, a former truant officer who now heads a private school where Wednesday and Pugsley are enrolled. When Hilliard breaks under the strain of dealing with the Addams children, Gomez buys the school.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Dr. Marvin P. Gunderson is summoned to examine Kitty Kat, the ailing lion pet of the Addams Family. Morticia decides that it is the doctor who needs help. To build his confidence, human members of the family pretend to be ill so he can effect cures.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Morticia's concern that Lurch is overworked leads Gomez to the operating table to assemble a custom-built secondary butler. Lurch lets the robot do all the work and then begins to feel that he isn't needed anymore.

programme.desc: When Uncle Fester incinerates the family's stuffed bear with his flamethrower, Morticia reports the accident to the insurance company. Mr. Henson the head of the company, sends his assistant, Mr. Digby, to handle the case.

programme.desc: Lurch suffers from unrequited love over Tiny Trivia (guest star Diane Jergens), Morticia's visiting school chum who only has eyes for show business. The entire family decides to try to turn their stolid butler into a new personality.

programme.desc: When Ophelia laments that she has been jilted, Morticia suggests a career as an alternative to marriage. She tries chemistry first (with explosive results) then turns to operatic singing. Cousin Itt is summoned to coach her to stardom.

programme.desc: Morticia and Gomez decide to keep Wednesday and Pugsley home from school after Morticia sees the fairy tales they have to read. When the truant officer comes to investigate, he is shocked at what he finds.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Animal Adventures

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Jack heads into South Africa's Zululand for an adventure with Cheetah, Rhino, Dung Beetles, and the Nyala antelope. Then he is welcomed into a Zulu tribe, with his daughter Kathaleen.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Jungle Jack takes his grandson on an epic Serengeti safari. They witness Cheetahs and Lions on the savannah, Wildebeest, and Zebra starting their annual migration, and visit a local Maasai school.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown
programme.desc: Join Jungle Jack for six of his all-time scariest safaris. Come along as he comes face-to-face with Alligators, Lions, Elephants, Cheetah, Tigers and more!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Animal Adventures
programme.desc: ack and Kathleen visit Joaquin's massive farm outside Guayaquil where he provides a haven for 45 species of animals native to Ecuador, including endangered spectacled bears, tapirs, and great green macaws.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Join Jack as he journeys to Lake Nakuru National Park where wildlife is prospering in Central Kenya. The thriving ecosystem is home to more than a million flamingos, endangered white and black rhinos, and the rare Rothschild giraffe.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown: Life in the Slow Lane
programme.desc: Today’s countdown is all about animals that know how to take it easy, from mellow mammals like manatees and koalas to relaxed reptiles like the giant Galapagos tortoise. Kick back, relax and take a ride in the slow lane!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Jungle Jack is exploring the state of Florida from the bottom up! From Sea Turtles in the Florida Keys, to Gators in the Swamp, Manatees in Crystal River to Cheetahs and Rhinos living large at White Oak. Come along for some fun in the Florida sun!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Animal Adventures
programme.desc: Jack and his daughter Kathleen share a boating adventure exploring the animal-rich rainforest surrounding the Panama Canal, including Howler and Capuchin monkeys and the deadly Fer de Lance snake.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Jack travels to Canada to check out four World Heritage sites in beautiful Alberta.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown: Animal Hospitals
programme.desc: Jack visits the doctors and hospitals that care for creatures big and small – from Silverback Gorillas and lightning-quick cheetahs to pet pigs and rescued possums. Today, see some of the world’s outstanding animal hospitals in action!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown: A Horse Unless of Course
programme.desc: If you thought horses were cool, just wait until you meet some of their surprising relatives! Rhinos, tapirs, donkeys, zebras and the Horse Whisperer himself!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown: On the Brink
programme.desc: For the animals on today’s countdown, like black rhinos, mountain gorillas and wild dogs, life is all about survival. Come along as Jack goes to ends of Earth to share seven spectacular stories of species on the brink.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Animal Adventures
programme.desc: The people of Maui love the endangered humpback. Join Jack, a group of seaworthy school children and the Pacific Whale Foundation for a first-rate expedition to observe these 40-ton gentle giants.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown: Wickedly Wild Countdown
programme.desc: Come along if you dare as Jungle Jack is counting down hair-raising true stories from the sea, land and air! Face-to-face encounters with bats, caiman, snakes, plus real dragons, on this Wickedly Wild Countdown.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown: Need for Speed
programme.desc: Today’s countdown is taking a ride in the fast lane with some of nature’s speediest creatures…horses, kangaroos, cheetah, falcons and more. Don’t blink! You might miss one of today’s super-sonic species.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Jack is taking his show on the road through sunny California!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Join Jungle Jack and his family as they immerse themselves into the elephant population at Zimbabwe's Hwange National Park. The Hanna's hide-out underground in a unique bunker at one of Hwange's watering holes.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown: Supreme Survivors
programme.desc: Whether it’s braving rough seas, extreme temperatures or rugged terrain, or knowing how to outwit an enemy, the creatures on today’s countdown are supremely adapted to survive the extremes.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown: Tree Huggers
programme.desc: Today’s creatures seem to defy gravity with their ease in the trees! Orangutans, gibbons, bats, sloths, and more!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Jack travels to the picturesque lands of Samburu National Reserve in Northern Kenya where he finds hope for animals like lions, gerenuk, and Cape buffalo that have been surviving through a long drought.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown: Top of the Pach-yderm

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild

programme.desc: Hairs and Fibers: The tiniest filament can become a mark of distinction in the most singular and intimate of ways. Investigators have come to rely on forensic evidence as fine as a carpet fiber or as innocent as an eyelash to crack difficult cases.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Forensic psychologists delve into the minds of serial killers, explaining why, most often, they can be a friendly neighbor or the tenacious co-worker – the one who hides his or her dark side better than anyone else.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Weeks pass as forensic investigators search for even the smallest clues, only to find what they feared in their own backyard. In Canada, two people die suddenly of unknown causes, and their deaths may not be as coincidental as they first appear.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: At a crime scene, anything left behind or seemingly out of place is considered a clue. But a fire can extinguish everything in its path –challenging forensic investigators at every turn and making each arson a trial by fire.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Using science as their most powerful weapon, investigators must find these hired killers and make them pay the true price of murder.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Lies and deceit can often throw investigators off the trail of justice. But when hard evidence contradicts a killer's story, police must use the clues to piece together the truth.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Some cases simply can't be solved with current technology or with the evidence at hand. But that doesn't mean they'll remain unsolved forever.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Forensic Entomology: Bugs have roamed the earth for 250 million years, but their intimate association with death is just now coming to life.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: The tread of a tire, a single shoe print and even the shape of a bruise help investigators track down killers, based solely on their patterns of guilt.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Years after a murder has been committed, investigators use advanced DNA analysis to shed new light on crimes that have gone unpunished for far too long.

programme.desc: While in the hospital recovering from overwork, Liz Powell keeps dreaming about going down to the hospital morgue.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone

programme.desc: An old radio is taking bitter bachelor Ed Lindsay back to a happier time before what he considers worthless tripe on television when he starts picking up radio programs from the 1930's and 1940's.

programme.desc: A compulsive gambler cajoles his friend to use his telekinesis to affect the results of the gambling tables in Las Vegas.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A toy telephone becomes the link between a young boy and his dead grandmother.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A pioneer from a wagon train in 1847 sets off to find something for his ill son and stumbles into present-day New Mexico.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: After successfully stealing a gold shipment, a group of criminals and their scientist accomplice put themselves in suspended animation in a remote desert cave. When they awaken decades later, complications ensue when their truck is destroyed.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: Annoyed by a club member's constant chatter, a man bets him he cannot remain silent for a year, living in a glass enclosure in the club basement.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: Adam Grant is trapped in a recurring nightmare, in which he is sentenced to death and executed.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone

programme.desc: Following a frantic phone call about a crashed spaceship, two policeman try and determine who among the passengers of a bus at a snowed-in roadside diner is from another world.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: In a future totalitarian society, a librarian is declared obsolete and sentenced to death.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A man and a woman, on opposite sides of a future war, encounter each other in a deserted town.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A plane lands safely, but the pilot, crew and all of its passengers are missing!

programme.desc: When a nuclear attack appears imminent, several suburban friends and neighbors fight over control of a single bomb shelter.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: When life within the walls begins to mimic life outside, the group realizes that sheltered life may not be possible.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Daryl finds trouble while on a run; Rick and the group feel like outsiders in Alexandria, where trouble approaches the gates.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Rick and the others have a difficult time assimilating into Alexandria; a new threat arises that could bring the group closer together.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: When it appears that things are starting to normalize in the settlement, a new problem arises for the Alexandrians.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: A small group, including Rick, runs into hurdles while trying to return to Alexandria, and some may not make it back.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Morgan recalls his travels from King County to Alexandria, where he encountered a solo survivor who taught him a new code to live by.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: The sheltered citizens inside the walls of Alexandria must face a grim reality that might be too much for them to handle; Deanna doubts her leadership.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Daryl, Abraham and Sasha encounter many obstacles and a new threat while trying to return to Alexandria.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Alexandria is finally able to begin pulling itself back together; peace is embraced between the two groups.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: After a few moments of peace, trouble finds its way to Alexandria again with a threat that may be too big to defeat.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Now that walkers have shown up inside the gates of Alexandria, Rick and the other survivors are scared and outnumbered.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: A simple scavenging run proves to be more tricky, when the survivors are not the only ones after a goldmine of supplies.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Rick encuentra una granja en la que buscar ayuda para salvar la vida de su hijo, quien recibió el impacto accidental de una bala. Después, Shane entra en una escuela llena de zombis para llevarse material sanitario junto al tipo que disparó a Carl.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Shane y Otis están atrapados por los zombis en la escuela adonde acudieron por el material sanitario necesario para operar a Carl. En la granja, surgen las primeras tensiones y Daryl y Andrea vuelven a salir en busca de Sophie.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Shane regresa a la granja con las medicinas, pero el sacrificio que he tenido que cometer no es bien visto por el resto del grupo. En la granja, el grupo intenta sacar a un zombi del pozo de agua fresca antes de que la infecte.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Mientras busca a Sophia, Daryl sufre un accidente que lo deja perdido y herido en el bosque. La tensión entre el grupo y los propietarios de la granja aumenta, así como la inestabilidad del propio grupo, debido a que Shane desafía a Rick.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Tras descubrir que la familia mantiene encerrada a sus familiares convertidos en zombis en el granero, Dale confronta a Hershel. Lori, por su parte, confiesa a Rick que está embarazada y los problemas entre los integrantes del grupo se intensifican.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Glenn le revela a todo el grupo el secreto del granero, pero no están de acuerdo sobre cómo actuar: Rick ordena respetar la autoridad de Hershel, aunque Shane quiere acabar con los zombis. Por otra parte, descubren por fin qué le ha pasado a Sophia.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Hershel no soporta lo ocurrido y recae en su alcoholismo, pero Rick y Glenn lo siguen hasta la ciudad para evitar que muera. Entretanto, Beth, incapaz de aceptar todo lo que le está sucediendo a su familia, entra en estado catatónico.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Lori sale en busca de Rick, pero lo único que encuentra es un peligro mortal y Shane va tras ella. Entretanto, Rick, Hershel y Glenn mantienen un tiroteo con los desconocidos con quienes cruzaron sus caminos en el bar.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: La tensión entre Rick y Shane aumenta y la decisión sobre el destino de Randall es el detonante: Shane quiere matarlo, Rick prefiere dejarlo vivo. Mientras, Beth pretende suicidarse y Andrea, quien debe vigilarla, no cumple con su cometido.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: El grupo descubre que Randall es un violador y asesino y acuerdan ejecutarlo, pero Dale se opone porque eso los convertiría también en criminales. Mientras tanto, Carl comete un error que acarreará consecuencias imprevistas.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Las diferencias entre Rick y Shane por el liderato del grupo y la gestión de la granja se intensifican cuando Shane decide por su cuenta el destino de Randall. La tensión termina estallando y los dos amigos se enfrentan a muerte.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Una horda de zombis invade la granja y el grupo intenta escapar vivo entre el caos, pero no todos lo lograrán. Además, Rick se harta de las quejas del grupo y les da un ultimátum: si quieren que sea el líder, acatarán sus órdenes.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: El grupo encuentra refugio en las instalaciones de una prisión federal abandonada tras meses en la carretera. Rick considera que se trata de un lugar seguro para que Lori pase los últimos meses de embarazo, pero quizá se haya equivocado.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Rick accede a dejar salir de sus celdas a los prisioneros si les ayudan a matar a los zombis que quedan en la prisión. Entretanto, la salud de Hershel empeora por momentos.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Andrea y Michonne descubren una comunidad de sobrevivientes liderada por un hombre llamado el Gobernador. Allá les ofrecen medicinas, comida, agua caliente y ropa limpia, pero Michonne desconfía del Gobernador y sus verdaderas intenciones.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: En Woodbury, Michonne desconfía del Gobernador y planea irse sin Andrea. En la prisión, un sabotaje provoca que una horda de zombis penetre en la cárcel y, mientras Rick y sus compañeros los combaten, Lori entra en trabajo de parto.

programme.title: The Wild Wild West
programme.desc: The board of directors of a corporation owned by a spinsterish tycoon appears to be the target of an insidious plot.

programme.title: The Wild Wild West
programme.desc: Masquerading as a polished gunfighter with a dishonorable discharge from the Army, James T. West arrives in Quemada, New Mexico, in a plush private railroad carwith orders from President Ulysses S. Grant to quell the terrorist activities.

programme.title: The Wild Wild West
programme.desc: Jim West and Artemus Gordon match wits with an arch-criminal of grandiose ambitions that plans to reclaim the empire of Mexico and establish himself as a new Napoleon.

programme.title: The Wild Wild West
programme.desc: Dr. Loveless, a dwarf, watches his giant assistant, Voltaire, subdue a dock guardas he (Loveless) pre-pares to kill disembarking Prof. Neilsen, arriving to present his formula for a new explosive to the U.S.government.

programme.title: The Wild Wild West
programme.desc: Four men, aided by a guard named Foxx, gain entrance to the U.S. Mint in Carson City and connect a hose to a street gaslight in order to asphyxiate three workers.

programme.title: The Wild Wild West
programme.desc: A man from the Attorney General's office in Washington is killed while attempting to take the wanted John Avery into custody, so secret agent James T.West is assigned to the task.

programme.title: The Wild Wild West
programme.desc: Traffic on the lower Mississippi River has come to a virtual standstill because of the marauding tactics of a blind pirate leader and his cutthroat gang.

programme.title: The Wild Wild West
programme.desc: James T. West is blamed for an impending international crisis when a quantity of priceless 'franconium,' a substance of fantastic power and owned by France, is stolen from under his nose at the French Consulate.

programme.title: The Wild Wild West
programme.desc: Secret agents James T. West and Artemus Gordon determine to track down a missing Albanian princess when the regal young lady they have been guarding turns out to be an impostor.

programme.title: The Wild Wild West
programme.desc: Cheyenne Indians are believed responsible for the daily death of five laborers whoare working to construct a railroad line. It is claimed that the Indians will stop the attacks if they are paid $500,000 in gold spikes.

programme.title: The Wild Wild West
programme.desc: Secret agent James T. West fights off an unprovoked knife-wielding assailant and then meets a beautiful blonde named Marie.

programme.title: The Wild Wild West
programme.desc: U.S. agent James T. West enlists in a secret army of fanatics whose demented leader is plotting to overthrow United States Army units stationed in the Southwest.

programme.title: The Wild Wild West
programme.desc: Secret agents James T. West and Artemus Gordon go after Dr. Cadwallader, demented geologist who is systematically devastating the state of Wyoming with man-made earthquakes.

programme.title: The Wild Wild West
programme.desc: Gov. Bradford and his secretary, Miss Piecemeal, watch as the governor's statue is unveiled during a private showing at the Bolt Museum. Suddenly, the statue blinks, and Bradford, immobilized by an injection, is taken prisoner.

programme.title: Ask This Old House
programme.desc: Nathan installs bypass doors for a pantry; Richard tests different smart automatic water shutoff valves; Ross explores asphalt roof shingles that can reflect some of the suns heat.

programme.title: Ask This Old House

programme.title: Best of George Foreman
programme.desc: All the best fight moments of boxer and entrepreneur "Big" George Foreman.

programme.title: Sugar Ray Leonard vs Davey Boy Green
programme.desc: On March 31st, 1980 Sugar Ray Leonard fought Davey Boy Green for the WBC World Welterweight titles at the Capitol Center in Landover in a bout that went 4 out of 15 rounds ending with a knockout victory for Leonard.

programme.title: Julio Cesar Chavez vs Ken Sigurani
programme.desc: On June 25th, 1998 Julio Cesar Chavez faced Ken Sigurani at the Foxwoods Resort in Mashantucket resulting in a technical knock out win for Julio Cesar Chavez.

programme.title: Muhammad Ali vs. Ken Norton 2
programme.desc: On September 10th, 1973 Muhammad Ali and Ken Norton participated in their second meeting at the Forum in Inglewood, CA. They fought for the North American Boxing Federation Heavyweight title with Ali winning this time with split decision.

programme.title: Sugar Ray Leonard vs Ayub Kalule
programme.desc: On June 25th, 1981 Sugar Ray Leonard faced Ayub Kalule for the WBA World Super Welterweight title at the Astrodome in Houston that ended by technical knockout in the ninth round giving Leonard the win.

programme.title: Marvin Hagler vs John Mugabi
programme.desc: On March 10th, 1986 Marvin Hagler and John Mugabi fought at the Caesars Palace Outdoor Arena in Las Vegas for IBF, WBA and WBC world middleweight titles while Mugabi was ranked number 1 by all three bodies the fight ended in a victory for Hagler.

programme.title: Evander Holyfield vs George Foreman
programme.desc: On April 19th, 1991, Evander Holyfield fought George Foreman for the WBC, WBA, and IBF Heavyweight Titles in Atlantic City. Both fighters displayed incredible skill and resilience, but Holyfield ultimately emerged victorious after 12 rounds.

programme.title: Roy Jones Jr vs James Toney
programme.desc: On November 18th, 1994, Roy Jones Jr fought James Toney for the IBF Super Middleweight Title at the MGM Grand in Las Vegas. Jones displayed his exceptional athleticism and speed, outclassing Toney to win a unanimous decision victory.

programme.title: Muhammad Ali vs Mac Foster
programme.desc: On April 1st, 1972 Muhammad Ali and Mac Foster fought in a fifteen round bout that ended in a unanimous decision win for Ali.

programme.title: Marvin Hagler vs Thomas Hearns
programme.desc: On April 15th, 1985, Marvin Hagler fought Thomas Hearns for the undisputed Middleweight Title at Caesars Palace in Las Vegas. Hagler and Hearns absolutely went at it from the bell which ended with Hagler securing a thrilling knockout victory.

programme.title: James Toney vs Charles Williams
programme.desc: On July 29th, 1994 James Toney and Charles Williams battled eachother for IBF World Super Middleweight titles at the MGM Grand in Las Vegas resulting in a knockout victory for James Toney.

programme.title: Roberto Duran vs Sugar Ray Leonard 1
programme.desc: On December 7th, 1989 Roberto Duran and Sugar Ray Leonard fought for the first time for the WBC World Super Middleweight at the Mirage Hotel in Las Vegas resulting in a unanimous decision win for Leonard.

programme.title: Hector Camacho vs Sugar Ray Leonard
programme.desc: On January 3rd, 1997 Hector Camacho faced Sugar Ray Leonard at the Convention Center in Atlantic City battling for IBC Middleweight title the bout ended after five rounds resulting in a victory for Leonard by technical knockout.

programme.title: Ray Mercer vs Tommy Morrison
programme.desc: On October 18th, 1991 Ray Mercer faced Tommy Morrison for the WBO World Heavyweight titles at the Convention Center in Atlantic City ending in technical knockout by Mercer earning him the victory and title but, he relinquished the title shortly after.

programme.title: Tommy Morrison vs George Foreman
programme.desc: On June 7th, 1993 Tommy Morrison battled George Foreman for the WBO world heavyweight title at the Thomas & Mack Center in Las Vegas with Foreman getting a point deducted in round ten the bout resulted in a victory for Morrison.

programme.title: Bat Masterson

programme.title: Bat Masterson

programme.title: Bat Masterson

programme.title: Bat Masterson
